name: Pinball FX: Universal Classics Pinball
description: Universal Classics Pinball combines three captivating tables based on the blockbuster films Jaws, the Back to the Future trilogy, and E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.

name: Pinball FX: The Machine - Bride of Pin Bot️
description: Here comes the Bride! Awaken the Machine by activating her vocal circuits and eyes. Or go even further and bring her to life! A legendary table from the PIN-BOT trilogy.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - Thrill of the Hunt
description: Two great tables! Whether it's for bounties in The Mandalorian or for Star Wars toy nostalgia in classic collectibles, the hunt is on.

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball Collection 2
description:
Star Wars Pinball Collection 2 brings the following tables:

- Star Wars Pinball: The Force Awakens
- Star Wars Pinball: Might of the First Order
- Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi
- Star Wars Pinball: Ahch-To Island
- Star Wars Pinball: Solo
- Star Wars Pinball: Calrissian Chronicles
- Star Wars Pinball: Battle of Mimban
- Star Wars Pinball: Rogue One
- Star Wars Rebels

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball Collection 1
description:
Star Wars Pinball Collection 1 brings the following tables:

- Star Wars: Episode V: - The Empire Strikes Back
- Star Wars: The Clone Wars
- Boba Fett
- Darth Vader
- Star Wars: Episode VI: - Return of the Jedi
- Star Wars: Starfighter Assault
- Han Solo
- Droids
- Star Wars: Episode IV: - A New Hope
- Star Wars Pinball: Masters of the Force

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball Collection 1
description:
Marvel Pinball Collection 1 brings the following tables:

- Captain America
- Doctor Strange
- Fantastic Four
- Iron Man
- Spider-Man
- Blade
- Wolverine
- Ghost Rider
- Thor
- X-Men
- Moon Knight

name: Pinball FX: Secrets and Shadows Pack
description: Delve into the shadows of the big city, explore secret tombs and hunt for treasure in the newest Zen Original Pack. Hone your pinball skills with updated graphics, gorgeous digital displays replacing the Dot Matrix and climb to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Pinball FX: Peanuts' Snoopy Pinball
description:
Join Snoopy, Woodstock, Charlie Brown, and the rest of the Peanuts gang on their adventures.
Shoot that jackpot, Charlie Brown. Play Peanuts' Snoopy Pinball!

name: Pinball FX: Gearbox Pinball
description: Travel to distant words, prove your honor and cunning on 3 amazing tables of the Gearbox Pinball Pack. Includes Homeworld: Journey to Hiigara Pinball, Borderlands: Vault Hunter Pinball, Brothers in Arms: Win the War Pinball.

name: Pinball FX: Garfield Pinball
description: Feast your way through mounds of lasagna to score big in Garfield Pinball! Dig up bones with Odie, woo Arlene, fight the alarm clock, and find Pooky the teddy bear to reach Feast Frenzy, all for a perfect feline day of eating and sleeping.

name: Frontier Hunter: Erza's Wheel of Fortune - Fashion
description: This packs several new costumes to the game.

name: Fortnite: Fallen Love Ranger Quest Pack
description: Take on the quests issued by the Fallen Love Ranger and earn up to 2,000 V-Bucks! Includes an Outfit, Back Bling and Quests to earn up to 2,000 V-Bucks.

name: Frontier Hunter: Erza's Wheel of Fortune - Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition contains the following:
- Base Game
- Soundtrack：There are many good songs
- Fashion bag：There are several outfits
- Weapon Pack：Help newbies grow

description: Sin descripción

name: Dig Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Soccer Star 23 Top Leagues
description: Sin descripción

name: Tap Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Make a Happy Baby
description: Sin descripción

name: Modern Cannon Strike
description: Sin descripción

name: Mistfall
description: Sin descripción

name: My Home Design: Makeover Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Hunting Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Towing Race
description: Sin descripción

name: King of Defense: Merge TD
description: Sin descripción

name: Tap Craft
description: Gather resources, craft new tools and build your idle empire on islands. This is an idle crafting game like you've never seen. Mine up rare metals, grow food to feed your thriving idle settlement, unlock new buildings, craft new items, and expand to new islands in Tap Craft.

name: Horror Tale 1: Kidnapper
description: Start a scary adventure and be the first to solve all the mysteries of this horror game!

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Cayo Perico Heist
description: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Cayo Perico is a content update for Grand Theft Auto Online. Playable from start to finish either as a lone operator or with up to three other players, discover dozens of ways to infiltrate and heist a brand-new location for the ultimate score.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: Los Santos Tuners
description: Grand Theft Auto Online: Los Santos Tuners is a content update for Grand Theft Auto Online. The game delivers an action-packed new update for all fans of GTA Online, featuring the LS Car Meet, a brand-new club and social space for players to get together and show off their customized personal vehicles and more player-requested features.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Criminal Enterprises
description: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Criminal Enterprises is a content update for Grand Theft Auto Online. The game features a wide range of GTA Online experience improvements, many of these the direct result of extensive and constructive feedback provided by the players.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: Los Santos Drug Wars
description: Grand Theft Auto Online: Los Santos Drug Wars is a content update for Grand Theft Auto Online. The game features a ragtag crew of new arrivals led by Dax, a man-on-the-edge with high hopes of dosing the world, getting rich, and climbing to the top of the Southern San Andreas criminal food chain.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Diamond Casino & Resort
description: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Diamond Casino & Resort is a content update for Grand Theft Auto Online. The update introduces The Diamond Casino & Resort, a newly-opened business located in East Vinewood where the original Vinewood Casino was found. The casino features an exclusive penthouse, casino floor, and garage storage.

name: SparkleWand Puzzle
description: Unique Puzzle Game ! Seemingly easy casual game at first but will still challenge you. Test you skill and perception and try pulling off tricky shots. Fun for all ages !

name: Lemmings
description: A unique mind-boggling game of multiple skill levels. Take command of the wackiest collection of misdirected rodents ever seen on your screen. Featuring fantastically animated graphics and simple yet addictive gameplay.

name: Lemmings
description:
Your task is to rescue the Lemmings across 120 levels of fast-paced puzzling. These creatures simply walk blindly through the world in the hope of reaching safety at the end of the level - unfortunately, these levels include steep drops, gaps in the ground, barriers, and rivers amongst other hazards.

You are in control not of any individual Lemming, but of a cross-hair, which can be moved over any of the Lemmings. Along the bottom is a selection of functions that can be assigned to a Lemming, including climbing, floating, and bashing. You must click to select the appropriate function, then click on the Lemming to activate it. Each level has a different range of skills on offer, a different amount of Lemmings, and a different percentage target in order to progress.

name: Lemmings
description: This port of Lemmings saw a pretty heavy graphics downgrade, with the resolution and screen size being reduced considerably. Perhaps most significant is the need to pause the game while choosing different Lemmings, which drastically affects the gameplay in a way that many believe is for the worse. The intro movie also sees a downgrade in resolution quality and the music/sfx are downgraded to 8-bit chiptune sounds.

name: Grand Theft Auto V: Story Mode
description: Grand Theft Auto V: Story Mode is an add-on for the standalone version of Grand Theft Auto Online. Players can experience the interwoven stories of Franklin, Michael, and Trevor across the sun-soaked metropolis of Los Santos and the backwoods' countryside of Blaine County in greater detail than ever before with stunning all new levels of visual detail. The game shares the same San Andreas map, although set in 2013.

name: Parcel Problems
description: ​​Parcel Problems​ is a fast-paced parcel packing simulator. You must cram items into boxes as fast as you can in the hopes that you're making your quota. Don't let your boss down!

name: Quacktown Smackdown
description: Play as a Rubber Ducky in this 3rd Person Arena Shooter! Utilize squirt guns and water abilities and sink your opponents to become top duck of the tub! Battle it out in the Bubble Bath Battlefield or the Stormy Sandbox. Customize your ducky to make sure the lobby knows who's the Smack Down King!

name: Retro Style: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: This bundle contains the original version of Grand Theft Auto V, the standalone game Grand Theft Auto Online and the story mode add-on of Grand Theft Auto V.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: The expanded version of Sonic the Hedgehog present in Sonic Jam. The main change is that Sonic is now able to use the Spin Dash, not present in the original game, changing the gameplay flow.

name: Apple Sauce Western
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic World
description: Sonic World is the first 3D experience of Sonic the Hedgehog, released in Sonic Jam. It is a playable and interactive map.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 port included in the Game.com port of Sonic Jam.

name: Apple Sauce X mas
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 port included in the Game.com port of Sonic Jam.

name: Sonic & Knuckles
description: Sonic & Knuckles port included in the Game.com port of Sonic Jam.

name: Apple Sauce Hinamatsuri
description: Sin descripción

name: Rusty
description: Sin descripción

name: Addmath
description: Sin descripción

name: Legends of Luisa Llama
description: Legends of Luisa Llama is a retro-modern 2D adventure game where you guide the sassy llama heroine through levels full of puzzles and exploration in a quest to stop an evil djinn bent on taking over the world.

name: Lemmings
description: The 3DO version of lemmings included a new 3d intro, sfx and music thanks to the newer hardware.

name: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator: Bug DLC
description: A DLC that includes 11 unique bugs that you can enable at will.

name: The Big One
description: Challenge your enemies by overcoming a simulation in perpetual construction. The Big One is an action/platform game of the "dungeon crawler" type, where your reflexes and concentration will be put to the test.

name: Kita e. Photo Memories
description:
Kita e. Photo Memories (北へ。Photo Memories) is a visual novel released for the Sega Dreamcast by Hudson Soft as part of the Kita e. series.

This fandisc includes additional content and a sequel story. This story has you returning to Hokkaido in the summer following your special kiss from the White Illumination festival. There are actually eight separate adventures, one for each girl. You start off by selecting the character with whom you'd like to share your upcoming exploits, and when you arrive back at the Hokkaido airport, she greets you. You travel off through Hokkaido, with the girl conversing with you and showing you around. As you travel, you can surprise the girl by taking a picture of her with the snap of a button, and this picture can be saved to the VMU and viewed later in a photo album.

name: Had
description: Darkness stole all of your stuff. let's get it back!

name: Re:Fresh
description: Restore your town as you run, jump, and dash through cozy locales while helping lovable townsfolk! Become immersed in a tight-knit community of animals and robots while becoming the town hero in this heart-warming solarpunk adventure.

name: Firestorm
description: Firestorm is an upcoming first and third-person shooter video game developed by Totem Arts, that aims to reimagine Tiberian Sun in the shooter genre. Firestorm is set in a reimagining of the Second Tiberium War, with elements taken from the eponymous Firestorm expansion pack and Tiberium Wars. Unlike the traditional C&C mode in the original Renegade and Renegade X, the main game mode of Firestorm is based on the conquest game mode found in large-scale modern military shooters such as Battlefield. Players will be able to construct buildings and expand by conquering outposts scattered throughout the map.

name: Zombie Land
description: A shooting gallery arcade for 1 to 4 players. In each of the 6 levels, the players need to shoot at zombies and fight a boss to get tickets.

name: Upper Ball
description: Jump and dogde! This is a super addictive game which you can play thousands times with just one finger. Tap the screen as fast as you can. And you can find the scores raise quickly. But be carefully! If you hit any barrier, game over. It's easy to play, but hard to master. Just have a try!

name: Volley Bomb
description: The game Volley Bomb is a variation on the subject of volleyball. From volleyball it is necessary what to play the main difference not a ball, and a bomb. The purpose of game to blow up a bomb on the territory of the opponent. The bomb blows up, if it concerns a floor, there were more than three contacts of a bomb or time of burning of a fuse ended. Before the beginning of game choose quantity of bombs. Besides, you can choose complexity level, a way of moving and a place of the player. For a jump you should concern the screen in any place, besides, which is used for traffic control.

name: Wordism
description: Wordism is a fun, new and relaxing word game that is going to light up your inner passion for words. Challenge yourself with six different play modes ranging from word searches to time challenges and infinite combo tricks. Discover how to get more points with unusual combinations, climb the leaderboards and complete the crazy 100 questions challenge.

name: Tuga Boy Adventures
description: Ready for an awesome adventure? Have fun around the world with Tuga Boy, the most adventurous turtle!

name: Treasure Train
description: Rebuild the track in time to collect gems with your train! Plan your route and strategize your next move to keep your train on track, and collect as many gems as you can! Play in Realm Explore or Endless Mission mode and choose from three trains for different difficulty levels to customize your game play experience!

name: The Beasties: Hello World
description:
Swoooooosh! With a glance you see a tiny creature run across the room. Did you see that? Why that’s a Beastie! Grab it!
What are The Beasties? Well, they are tiny creatures that go unnoticed in our world, but now you have a chance to learn all about these special, smart creatures.
Each and every type of Beastie has a unique personality that will determine which of its needs are most important. If players don’t keep up with their Beasties needs, the Beastie won’t survive for long. Care for, train, train, play and customize your Beasties with your own signature style in The Beasties: Hello World!

name: The Mute House
description: Inspired by old and classic survival horror games, The Mute House combines exploration, management, puzzles and a touch of action. As Emily investigates about her sister's vanishing, she finds herself trapped in a mysterious mansion.

name: Super Smash Asteroids
description: "Super Smash Asteroids" is a high-speed, twin-stick, top-down, rogue-like space shooter. Choose from 6 unique ships, upgrade with 70+ items & blast through epic bosses. Level up for intense, action-packed battles in a futuristic universe. Buckle up for a thrilling journey to glory!

name: Number Match
description:
Number Match is an easy number addition puzzle game that anyone can play. Train your concentration and logic and try to beat your best score!

Playing addictive number matching games will not only benefit your mental health, but will also help you unwind, especially after a hard day.
Number Match is an easy and fun math game to wake up your sleeping brain! Combine numbers to clear the game board. There are so many ways to solve number puzzles, but it's not as easy as it seems.
Have fun exercising your brain with Number Match - number addition puzzles! Play number games anytime, anywhere!

name: 50 Days to Survive
description: Having survived a plane crash, you are the last one alive. You find yourself alone in the middle of a desert, and devoid of all hope. Quickly find what to eat, what to drink, what to shelter you, and improve your comfort of life to avoid death. Can you survive for 50 days? Let's see that.

name: Alignment
description: A challenging and engaging puzzle game that will require you to move colored objects and place them on their respective platforms to explore through a series of increasingly complex levels.

name: Ball vs. Zombie
description: A stationary strategy tower defense game. Place balls to block zombies Don't let zombies into the house Player's hand speed, strategy matching, ball matching, Protect the surviving humans, the ball warriors protect the humans

name: Goblins
description: Goblins is a goofy strategy action game. You command the Green Goblin Army, attempting to defeat the Red Goblin Army and finally win the Great Gold War. Battle through 20 unique Campaign maps and continue your progress in Freeplay and Sandbox game modes.

name: Manual Overcycle
description: Manual Overcycle is the evolution of bicycle gameplay. With it's unique physics-based gameplay, bicycle gamers finally have the expressive controls they have always dreamed of.

name: Knight Raider
description: Knight Raider is a wave-based game set in a dungeon aesthetic environment. Kill enemies, purchase power-ups, and don't die! How fast can you beat it?

name: Pi Fu Fighter
description: This is a game created by me. Players will operate multiple fighter planes to form a fighter formation to deal with endless and uniform enemies. Of course, players can synthesize stronger fighters by picking up fighter cards or use different attribute cards to strengthen their fighters.

name: S&T: Medieval Wars
description:
The history of medieval Europe is rich in bloody wars and conflicts. The Norman invasion, the Crusades, the Hundred Years' War, the Reconquista, the Wars of the Roses, the Albigensian Crusade and endless peasant riots… A new game in the Strategy & Tactics series gives you an opportunity to try your strength in confrontations between the most ruthless conquerors.
In Medieval Wars: Strategy & Tactics you are to lead the armies of England and France as well as the armies of crusaders and vikings in four campaigns and try to win the biggest wars and battles of European medieval history. Scenario maps will let you take part in Russian feuds, stop the Saracens under the flag of Charles the Great and lead The Hussites.

name: Reckless Death Race
description: The game is afoot! Fight for your survival in a post-apocalyptic world. Society has been torn down, the only way to escape enslavement is to upgrade, level & unlock new Hovercars and Weapons to strike fear into the cold hearts of roving man-machine bandits.

name: Penguin Pairs
description: Penguin Pairs is a pairs matching game with colorful sea animals, magic sounds and the "Pop the balloons" mini game. A game for the whole family.

name: Mr. Fish
description: Sin descripción

name: From A to B
description: Addictive puzzle game suitable for all ages! From A to B puts your mind to the test: can you figure out the correct route to get the car From A to B, collecting all 3 stars, with only a limited number of road pieces?

name: Gold Taker
description:
Collect the hopping gold nuggets by tapping them at their exact positions.
More gold nuggets will flood the screen as time goes on!
Collect gold nuggets as much as possible to avoid them crashing to the wall.

name: L Pop
description:
L Pop is a casual puzzle game from Jambav.
In the world of L Pop, you will place your next colored-bubble on the board just like the Knight (horse) in the game of chess makes its next move.
(Now you know why we said we drew inspiration from the game of chess, for L Pop!)
You can continue to place the bubbles on the board until you run out of options.
Match three or more bubbles to Pop them!

name: Mars Xplorer
description: As a sole robotic survivor of the first colony on Mars, it’s your job to get revenge against the mysterious alien force that has wiped out your companions. Stranded, but equipped with weapons, defensive shields, and booster rockets you’ll roam the barren Mars landscape looking for trouble. If your rover takes too much damage, Goji Play users will need to exercise faster in order to complete the repairs. In addition to the main “Arcade” mode, you can also play through a “Hill Workout” and a “Time Rush” mode which are perfect for people exercising.

name: Jigsaw Puzzles All in One
description: Enjoy playing the jigsaw quality puzzles! Drag and rotate pieces to recreate the image. The level of complexity is determined by the number of pieces in the puzzle, which can be anywhere from easy 42 to whopping 288 pieces.

name: Maze Racing
description:
In Maze Racing you are facing challenging mazes with racing cars.
Get your cars to the finish and overcome obstacles like barriers, bridges and remote-controlled cars along the way.
Send two cars to the workshop to combine them or change their color in the paint shop to find the right solution.
Avoid collisions with other cars. Collect items on the race track to unlock new chapters.
100 diverse levels require thought, dexterity and a good sense of timing.

name: Football Seasons
description:
Football Seasons is a fast paced deck building game about football world.
The thrill of an entire championship in an exciting board game.

name: Demons vs. Wizards
description:
A long time ago, when dragons were still flying above the castles… When true knights were often fighting for damsels in distress… When magic was not just a word from some old and dusty fantasy book… Back at that time the game called Demons vs. Wizards was popular in many taverns scattered across realms, which are long forgotten nowadays. As magic and sword duels were forbidden in most of the inns and taverns, this magic card duel game was the only way to settle the scores with an annoying young wizard, some bully stranger or even a travelling demon.
Demons vs. Wizards is a 5-10 minute turn-based card and dice game. It is so simple that even a small kid can play it without reading a complicated manual. You can either challenge your friends, or beat the computer controlled opponent to test your luck for today. Two players can play on the same screen, so it truly feels like a real tabletop card game.

1010! is a wildly addicting brain teaser - a simple puzzle game that will challenge you, while also training your brain. Put your puzzle skills to the test with this game.
The concept is simple - on a 10x10 board, combine puzzle blocks and clear the board by placing them strategically to create lines. There’s no limit to play, no color matching, and no match three repetition - just fill the grid with shapes, clear the play area, and see if you can beat your high score.

name: 4 Letters 1 Word
description:
4 Letters 1 Word is the endless four letters combination word puzzle game.
We give you four letters, and you make a word as quickly as you can. Once time runs out, have another go! Keep making words to increase your score.

name: Azzle
description: Azzle is an amazing tile puzzle game that will keep you entertained for many hours. The goal is simple: take or use your favorite picture and solve the puzzle made from it.

name: BasketBall Street Hero
description: Let’s play basketball, be the real basketball champion and play the basketball machine with your skills as a hoops, showdown, slam dunk, dribbles, shoot and win!

name: Bingo Bay
description:
Now people all around the world can enjoy the fun of Bingo!
Enjoy a game of Bingo on the go. Anytime and anywhere.

name: Birds In Paradise
description: Love bird games or block puzzle matching game? Introducing an incredibly addictive puzzle block matching game where you match three or more birds of same color to crush them from the block. Birds in Paradise includes very cute and amazing game graphics so you will fall in love with the game play while playing with birds in this birds paradise game. Play this game with cute birds of different colors. This birds paradise game also includes different themed obstacles while playing. You come across different explosions in the birds block puzzle match game.

name: 99 Fails
description: Can you hold your focus while platforming through Zeebo's bizarre nightmare? Uncover his sad backstory in adventure mode and unlock 3 mechanics to race friends in PVP multiplayer to music by the awesome David Wise!

name: Google Maps: Pokémon Challenge
description: The Google Maps: Pokémon Challenge was a game launched by Google during April Fools' Day 2014. During the event, users of the Google Maps mobile application were given the ability to catch Pokémon scattered around the actual maps. Google's Pokédex consists of 25 Pokémon from each the first six generations, as well as Mew (which appeared and roamed after the user catches the other 150 Pokémon). The Pokédex includes all starter Pokémon, Eevee and all eight Eeveelutions, all seven final form pseudo-legendary Pokémon, and all electric rodents

name: Lemmings
description: This Atari ST port is graphically very similar to the Amiga release, but has far downgraded music, sound (speech is absent), and worse color.

name: YouTube Snake
description: YouTube Snake was an easter egg game in the YouTube video play that was first included in July 2010, however has since been removed. The game was a playable version of the game Snake and was accessible by pressing up when a video was buffering.

name: Canine
description: Canine is a PSX style horror game about a boy looking for his dog, kidnapped by an evil corporation that runs experiments with pets.

name: Ovivim
description: Ovivim is a virtual pet for streamers that lives on Twitch streams by its own free will. These little creatures come in many different forms, and how they grow depends on how you care for them.

name: Poor Bunny!
description: Poor Bunny! Is a silly little highscore chaser where you control a cute little bunny who must eat all the tasty carrots while avoiding rapidly appearing traps. How long can you survive before you get overwhelmed?

name: Mission Impossibubble
description: A maze game with 6 stages where you must evade or shoot enemies while collecting 8 scroll fragments in a set order to free a prisoner then take them back to the start of the stage.

name: Millipede
description: Game Boy port of Millipede, released in a bundle alongside Centipede.

name: Defender
description: Game Boy port of Defender, released alongside Joust.

name: Joust
description: Game Boy port of Joust, released alongside Defender.

name: The C64 Collection 2
description:
TheC64 Collection 2 brings 14 8-bit home computer classics from the beloved C64 platform to Evercade.

Includes :
- California Games
- Cybernoid
- Firelord
- Impossible Mission II
- Insects in Space
- Mission Impossibubble
- Nebulus
- Pitstop II
- Slayer
- Street Sports Basketball
- Sword of Fargoal
- Uridum
- World Games
- Zamzara

name: Tall Tales
description: A nostalgic, turn-based RPG where you battle monsters in real-time! Collect loot! Go fishing! Mine for Power Runes! Solve puzzles! Customize your characters stats! Meet eccentric and interesting individuals! As well as accepting quests from collecting butterflies to saving the world!

name: Felix the Toy DX
description: The complete Felix The Toy experience is now on Nintendo Switch! Explore a world from the perspective of a small toy. At exactly 6:12 p.m the human race vanishes into thin air.

name: CastleDefense: RaiseArcher
description: A simple RPG-type defense game! After equipping a secondary weapon from level 5, the fun begins!

name: Toaplan Arcade 2
description:
Enjoy some of Toaplan's finest arcade titles with this new collection of 7 games for Evercade.

Includes:
- Fire Shark
- Twin Cobra
- Twin Hawk
- Hellfire
- Rally Bike
- Wardner
- Demon's World

name: Wonder Trips
description: Wonder Trips is designed to take you into different lands to enjoy many trips and activities. Have Lot Of Fun by riding, racing, para-sailing and more... It's time to discover different wonderlands and enjoy your own trips.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Saikyo-Kawagoe Line - Osaki to Kawagoe E233-7000 series
description: The Saikyo and Kawagoe Lines are one of the major commuter lines in the Tokyo metropolitan area, running from Osaki Station via Omiya Station to Kawagoe Station.

name: Street Fighter 6: Lenticular Edition
description: The Lenticular Edition is a physical standard edition of the game that comes with a holographic key art sleeve designed to give a sense of depth and motion as the viewing angle changes.

name: Street Fighter 6: Mad Gear Box
description:
The Mad Gear Box is the physical collector's edition of Street Fighter 6, it includes the mad gear box itself, Pop Up Parade Figures of Luke and Kimberly, the artbook, a sticker set, the Figure Diorama Board, a standard physical edition of the game and a code for the Year 1 Ultimate Pass.

The Year 1 Ultimate Pass includes 4 new characters, 3 outfits with colors 1-10 for the new characters, 2 additional stages and 7,700 Drive tickets (in-game currency).

name: Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League - Deluxe Edition
description:
Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is an action-adventure shooter developed by Rocksteady Studios. Set in Metropolis, players control Harley Quinn, Deadshot, Captain Boomerang, and King Shark as they battle a brainwashed Justice League under Brainiac's control. The game features third-person combat, open-world exploration, and live-service elements. It received mixed reviews for its narrative and repetitive gameplay mechanics.

Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League - Deluxe Edition features:

- All Standard Edition content and pre-order bonuses.
- Four Justice League Outfits, one for each Squad member.
- Three Black Mask-themed notorious weapons (pistol, sniper rifle, and heavy weapon).
- Four Squad Golds-themed weapon dolls, one for each Squad member.
- One premium battle pass token.
- Up to 72-hour early access to the game, prior to the main launch.

name: Dredge: Deluxe Edition
description: The ultimate pack for your impending voyage. The Dredge Deluxe Edition includes everything you’ll need to weather the seas and trawl the deep for sinister secrets.

name: Connected Hearts: The Musketeers Saga - DLC
description: Love can help you overcome many obstacles, even if the fate of an entire kingdom is at stake! Can two heroes in love make it through? Find out in this game!

name: Null Breach
description:
Lost in a collapsing dimension. It's time runs out. Can you save it from it's demise?

A 2D Roguelike Platformer. Be fast, precise and spend your time wisely. Can you get all 10 abilities? How long will you be able to survive?

You play as Meex, the creator of this dimension. But something went wrong. Upon entering his newly created world he was horrified to discover that it has fallen apart. There was only void with some scattered landmasses.

This worlds time runs out and Meex is lost in this dimension. Collect Time Orbs and defeat Void Eater to gain more time. Unlock new abilities and save your dimension.

name: Heath Robinson Solutions
description:
The sixth entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2012.

name: The Castle Burns!
description: Kill literally all of the Goblins, Orcs and other monsters with ridiculous oversized weapons and items born from pure insanity in this 2D Roguelike Arena Survival game! Do it fast, because The Castle Burns!

name: The Lizard King
description:
Tomb Raider fan game made using the Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation engine. It's a new experience using the resources that one of the oldest games in the franchise has to offer.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2005.

name: Red Oddities
description: Red Oddities is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame, a point and click horror game. Created by the Radiance Team, the game was intended to be a joke and not to be taken seriously. On January 25, 2022, the game’s application was finally found after it’s game page was deleted for a few years.

name: Galaga
description: Game Boy port of Galaga.

name: Mappy
description: Game Boy port of Mappy.

name: Namcot Classic
description: Game Boy port of Namcot Classic.

name: Sky Kid
description: Game Boy port of Sky Kid.

name: Babel
description: Game Boy port of Babel.

name: Family Tennis
description: Game Boy port of Family Tennis.

name: Layers of Fear
description: A remake of the original Layers of Fear and its DLC, as well as a new DLC from the perspective of the painter's wife. This remake in Unreal Engine 5 adds new core mechanics and features to blend the chapters together seamlessly.

name: Layers of Fear 2
description: A remake of Layers of Fear 2 and its DLC. This remake in Unreal Engine 5 adds new core mechanics and features to blend the chapters together seamlessly.

name: Rage Quit
description: Start with up to 999 lives in this mad dash for survival through a fast-paced digital gauntlet of lasers, UFOS, meteors,and giant fists! With twenty levels and five difficulty settings, there are plenty of challenges ahead! Earn medals for your achievements!

name: Galaxian
description: Game Boy port of Galaxian.

name: The Tower of Druaga
description: Game Boy port of The Tower of Druaga.

name: Mortal Kombat
description: Game Boy port of Mortal Kombat.

name: Mortal Kombat II
description: Game Boy port of Mortal Kombat II.

name: Yie Ar Kung-Fu
description: Game Boy port of Yie Ar Kung-Fu.

name: Antarctic Adventure
description: Game Boy port of Antarctic Adventure.

name: Mario: The Music Box Remastered
description:
Mario has heard rumours of an abandoned mansion that has been close to the Mushroom Kingdom for over a century. Any person who dares step into the mansion's rooms, never returns. Mario and Princess Peach were supposed to investigate the strange place but Mario decided to go alone. Inside the home he finds a strange music box that was playing by itself. Little did he know that a "harmless" music box would've caused the home to try to eat him alive. Find out as you comb through a dangerous mansion and find out the story of it's residents and how they met their fate.

Will you be able to guide the cheery hero of the Mushroom Kingdom back home? Or will he lose himself.

name: Lis: Achados & Perdidos dos Confins do Universo
description: How sharp are your organization skills? It’s time to discover!

name: Rhythm Storm
description: Rhythm Storm is a roguelike bullet heaven with stunning vector graphics, rhythmic action, and overwhelming swarms of enemies. Your vehicle aims and fires automatically while everything else dances and moves to the beat in this spectacular audio-visual experience.

name: Siege of Osaka
description: Siege of Osaka is a retro hybrid of Beat-em-up and Brick Breaker. Send enemy ninja rolling into walls and fortifications to bring down their castles. Localized/parodied for American audiences.

name: The Legend of Dragoon
description:
Experience The Legend of Dragoon originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Unveil a fantasy of magnificence, deception, magical combat, and retribution as you join swordsman Dart and his companions to harness the spiritual forces of Dragons and triumph over evil.

Using a unique and innovative tactical combat system, transform into Dragoons and unleash extraordinary powers. Control a wide variety of characters that wield unique weapons and Dragoon attacks powered by the elements in this unforgettable role-playing game.

name: Dragon Warrior I
description:
Game Boy Color port of Dragon Warrior, released alongside its sequel in the Dragons Warrior I.II compilation.

In this version, the US localization has a whole new translation with names closer to the original, letting go of the Old-English-like language used in the original. The games have been tweaked to make it slightly easier and allow the player to progress faste

name: Dragon Warrior II
description:
Game Boy Color port of Dragon Warrior II, released alongside its prequel.

In this version, the US localization has a whole new translation with names closer to the original, letting go of the Old-English-like language used in the original. The games have been tweaked to make it slightly easier and allow the player to progress faster.

name: Dragon Quest
description:
Remake of Dragon Warrior released for the Super Famicom in the Dragon Quest I.II compilation.

This remake includes updated graphics that retain the original look, sound of higher quality, and some changes in the gameplay and in the game world: certain locations are larger, some menu commands (such as "Stairs") are omitted, and there is a larger variety of items.

name: Dragon Quest II
description:
Remake of Dragon Warrior II released for the Super Famicom in the Dragon Quest I.II compilation.

This remake includes updated graphics that retain the original look, sound of higher quality, and some changes in the gameplay and in the game world: certain locations are larger, some menu commands (such as "Stairs") are omitted, and there is a larger variety of items.

name: Plink Game
description: Game with Plink where you need to beat the game and collect as many as you can coins!

name: Pac-Attack
description: Game Boy Color version of Pac-Attack.

name: EverQuest: Night of Shadows
description:
Norrathians have ended the conflict between Mayong Mistmoore and Luclin herself, but can they relax their vigilance? The recent attention of Luclin has emboldened the Akheva, and they continue their plans to conquer the moon!

As war rages across the surface of Luclin, disaster has befallen Shadow Haven deep below. The mysterious sealed door has been smashed open, and the great spirit trapped behind it has rampaged through the city, leaving death and destruction before retreating to the unknown caverns it escaped from. What maddened the spirits? How can the Akheva be stopped? Can Shar Vahl survive as war threatens to engulf the city? The truth lies in the shadows -- will you survive to find it?

name: Super Pac-Man
description: Game Boy Color port of Super Pac-Man.

name: Brain Damage
description: Brain Damage is a dark, emotional journey in the mind of a serial killer that picks up a hitchhiker. Without revealing too much, memory, feedbacks, drilling, saws, acid are all in there, somewhere between a game and a movie all done in minimal monochrome pixel style graphics.

name: Ms. Pac-Man: Maze Madness
description: Game Boy Advance port of Ms. Pac-Man: Maze Madness.

name: Victim Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: Moose In Canada
description: A game that is good for speedrunning and is an adventure kind of story game.

name: Pokemon Broken Circuit
description: A Pokemon fan game based in the Sagqa region! Adventure with your starter, choosing between Slynx, Torrear, or Oraft, and adventure the region while taking on Team Spectrum while training to be the very best!

name: Wild Arms 2
description:
Experience Wild Arms 2 originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

It’s about one world hanging in the balance. Where one hero must sacrifice his heart for peace. Where courage and fear, love and malice, heroes and villains go hand in hand. It’s power that exceeds human knowledge. It’s neither dream nor reality. It’s what legends are made of.

name: This was Once a Place of Honour
description: Sin descripción

name: Harvest Moon: Back to Nature
description:
Experience Harvest Moon: Back to Nature originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

It’s a Different Kind of RPG for the Entire Family!

As a child you visited your Grandfather’s ranch when vacation plans fell through. Return to the farm that holds fond childhood memories and rejuvenate its long neglected fields. Tend to your livestock and interact with over 50 characters. As you struggle to make the farm something your grandfather would be proud of, one nagging question remains: What ever happened to the little girl that you knew a decade ago?

name: Alone: Cold Winter
description: Alone - Cold Winter is reimagination of Alone - Eternal Nightmare, which is a RPG-Maker action-horror game, that was heavily inspired by cult classics like Resident Evil, Silent Hill and Project Zero.

name: Disney's Animated Storybook: Toy Story
description: Part of Disney's Animated Storybook series, this game adapts the 1995 Pixar movie Toy Story into a point-and-click adventure format.

name: Our Private Homeroom
description: Our Private Homeroom is an otome game by Voltage Inc and available on Love 365: Find Your Story.

name: A World With out You
description: A World With (out) You is an Otome game by Voltage Inc.

name: Masquerade Kiss
description: Masquerade Kiss is a spy themed romance game. It is one of the first games to be part of the Love Choice. You are a spy sent to bring your target down and falling for him risks you being killed if he exposes you.

name: Romance MD: Always on Call
description: Romance MD: Always On Call is a medical-themed game and its main stories are Love Choices.

name: Stream Defense
description: This is a class-based tower defense game which challenges you and your Twitch viewers to work together. In Stream Defense, your viewers can play alongside you by typing commands into chat. Each viewer has full control over their character. Your viewers can even continue playing while you sleep!

name: Destind: Mr. Almost Right
description: Destined: Mr. Almost Right is an otome game by Voltage Inc. The game is found in Love 365: Find Your Story.

name: Minecraft: Mega Man X
description: Dash through the blockiest Mega Man X world, charged with the original Mega Man X soundtrack and 14 classic skins from the series! Use The Blue Bomber’s arsenal of 9 weapons to fight an army of Mavericks, make your way through iconic levels, and defeat epic bosses.

name: The dream where even though you've been done with school for years you have to go back to school because of a class you forgot about
description: Sin descripción

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Shinsengumi Captain's Set
description:
The Shinsengumi Captain's Set contains the extra difficulty level "Ishin" for players looking for an additional challenge, as well as a set of 16 cosmetic items, skin and haori designs for Like a Dragon: Ishin! main character, Sakamoto Ryoma.

The set of cosmetics items includes:
- Skin: Scarred Ryoma
- Skin: Shinobi Ryoma
- Skin: Kabuki Ryoma
- Skin: Chicken Ryoma
- Haori: Fiery Soul
- Haori: Golden
- Haori: Big Catch
- Haori: Cherry Blossom
- Haori: Midnight
- Haori: Dawn of the Tojo
- Haori: Great Beauty
- Haori: Proud Sumo
- Haori: Sushi Served Fresh
- Haori: Elegant Teacup
- Haori: Dragon Samurai
- Haori: Festival Wear

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Third Division Armament Expansion Kit
description:
The Third Division Armament Expansion Kit contains a set of additional Trooper Cards to boost the player's ranks. This pack of 8 Legendary Troopers and 15 Epic Troopers includes, among others, "Yakuza: Like a Dragon" Ichiban Kasuga and Omelette.

In addition to the Trooper Cards, consumable items to level up your troops and high-value goods are included.

The Third Division Armament Expansion Kit contains:
- Legendary Trooper: Kasuga Ichinojo
- Legendary Trooper: Nishitani Shigeharu
- Legendary Trooper: Mukoda Sae
- Legendary Trooper: Makimura Mako
- Legendary Trooper: Toranosuke
- Legendary Trooper: Yama-goroshi
- Legendary Trooper: Karaage
- Legendary Trooper: Mamezo
- Epic Trooper: Attack Instructor x3
- Epic Trooper: Defense Instructor x3
- Epic Trooper: Medical Instructor x3

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Sword Upgrade Materials Kit
description:
The Sword Upgrade Materials Kit contains consumable items used as materials to upgrade Sakamoto Ryoma's swords.

It contains:
- Pearl x1
- Fluorite x1
- Marksman's Fan x1
- Precious Steel x15
- Silver Scrap x20
- Gold Nugget x20
- Gold Chunk x20
- Kiwami Hammer x1
- Kiwami Seal x2

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Gun Upgrade Materials Kit
description:
The Gun Upgrade Materials Kit contains consumable items used as materials to upgrade Sakamoto Ryoma's guns.

The Gun Upgrade Materials Kit contains:
- Obsidian Chunk x1
- Marksman's Fan x1
- Dragon Whisker x1
- Exquisite Cogwheel x20
- Rusty Spring x20
- Small Wind-up Device x15
- Gold Hammer x1
- Kiwami Hammer x1
- Kiwami Seal x2

name: Cartoon Rage
description: Gather up to 8 friends in this friendship-strengthening game! Solve puzzles, think together, and beat all levels while having a lot of fun! Meet new obstacles and gameplay mechanics as you progress throughout the game until you reach the ultimate puzzles!

name: Destiny of a Wizard 3: Beyond the World
description: Before the Blue Wizard could celebrate the defeat against Zarra, our hero was whisked away into another world! What brought him here? Why is he here? And most importantly, can he get back to his original world? An all new adventure awaits in Destiny of Wizard 3: Beyond the World!

name: Pitball: Winter Waifus
description: Pinball-like arcade fun with a variety of challenging levels and cute winter-themed waifus.

name: Grim Tales: Horizon of Wishes
description: What is Richard up to? Pursue Anna's missing father through time!

name: Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle Collection: Valentine's Edition
description: Enjoy the jigsaw puzzles with high quality sexy hentai girls that our Valentine's Day theme. Move the puzzle pieces to make the complete image More then 14 different jigsaw puzzles to complete

name: Tiles Fall
description: "Tiles Fall" is a very simple and very interesting casual elimination game.

name: Beat Your Vegetables
description: Alert! Alert! Numbuh 4 accidentally ate some Brussels sprouts! Shrinkify yourself and go destroy those villainous vegetables from the inside out!

name: Tonto Run: Lone Ranger Edition
description:
Try out this cool Tonto indian running game.
Tap to avoid obstacles from cowboys to flying arrows. Easy to learn and hard to master. Enjoy this endless running game and see how far you can go without falling off the train.

name: Space Repairman
description: The mothership is in dire need of repair. Do you have what it takes to guide a group of courageous space repairmen through the treacherous cosmos and land safely into the mothership?

name: Road Rage 3D
description: Road Rage 3D is an endless racing game that takes you on a high-speed journey. With the help of various powerups, and a selection of unlockable cars including a Taxi, Police Car, Schoolbus and Limousine.

name: Retro Formula 3D
description:
This game is something different - it combines old, classic retro game with new, 3D look.
Those thing combined are creating extraordinary feel - this is Retro Formula 3D!!!
Race in clear day, or in a rainy afternoon! Or maybe you prefer racing at night - you can also try that!

name: Omino!
description:
Omino! is a fun puzzle game where strategy meets match-3.
Drag and match colorful rings to create beautiful chain reactions in this endless brain teaser.

name: Monko Climbo
description:
Addictive tile climbing game with adorable character and quality graphics
Climb as high as you can!

name: Matchmaker Millie
description:
Millie has decided to become a professional matchmaker and needs your help!
Guide wandering singles to their true love, while avoiding their mis-matches. Unlock different match making venues and characters as you help Millie get through her match making sessions and follow along her story to becoming a successful matchmaker.

name: Monster Adventures Crazy
description: Combining the monster-catching with the adventure elements of Zelda, Monster Adventures brings an all new blend of action/RPG gameplay to the Store! Catch, create and customize your own unique monsters while uncovering an interesting story. Journey deep into the wilderness to complete quests, find loot, and level-up your monsters. Then battle monsters in the renowned monster coliseum!

name: Midnight Mysteries: Ghostwriting - Collector’s Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Help Annie
description: "Help Annie" is an adventurous interactive mystery thriller in the style of a messenger app game. YOU are Annie's last and only hope, the choices YOU make may save Annette Lewis who is – instead of spending a once-in-a-lifetime vacation – confronted with a series of mysterious events. Caught up in the shadows of her past, it’s now a matter of life and death.

name: Seven: Deadly Revelation
description:
This is the beginning of the interactive thriller genre “Seven” and the predecessor to “Seven: Endgame”, in both of which you decide your own scary interactive story.

Being contacted on your mobile phone by the personified evil leaves you breathless. Spine-chilling suspense is guaranteed in this interactive horror adventure! Your decisions determine which course the events in this thriller will take and how the story will end. Immerse yourself in the darkest depths of the human soul and experience an enthralling, spellbinding psycho thriller adventure trip that you will never forget! You will never forget the bone chilling story that’s about to unfold in Seven.

name: Seven: Endgame
description:
"Seven: Endgame" is the sequel story to the successful interactive thriller app "Seven: Deadly Revelation", in which you decide your own scary interactive story.
Just when you thought the horror had come to an end and you could live in safety from now on, the evil strikes again.
An eerie stranger contacts you and forces you to make life and death decisions. He corners you and threatens the people you care about. Follow the clues in pictures, on the Messenger, on documents and in the calls of the dangerous stranger. Find out who is behind the mask and save the lives of your loved ones.

name: The Sign
description:
Imagine there's a video full of nightmarish and shocking images circulating. As soon as you've watched it, your phone rings and a voice whispers "You have 7 days left..."
Does that RING a bell? We bring the triumph of the creepy video cassette from the 90s to the present! When evil enters your smartphone, your life will turn into a horror trip!
Your classmate and good friend Gabriela has been acting strangely for a week and has been keeping to herself more and more. Just when you were about to contact her parents, she gets in touch and shares her mysterious story: Exactly 7 days ago, she saw a creepy video and then received a call saying that she was going to die today...

name: African Safari Race
description: Ozzie Ostrich is being chased by a bad hunter! Help him run away so he doesn't get caught. But your ostrich must avoid all the other African animals coming their way or they'll get eaten!

name: Arbeiten Spiel!
description: This funny game is a groundbreaking invention.

name: Avoid Rect
description: Avoid Rect is a dynamic and beautiful game!

name: Blockd Blast
description: Blockd Blast is a drag and drop block puzzle for players of any age! Join users from all around the world in this block puzzle mania and be a part of the infinite craze. Pop the blocks to last as long as possible before the game board fills up and get the highest score!

name: Blocky Roads Winterland
description:
Jump into your car and discover the snowy mountains of Winterland!
Oh no, your animals wandered away from your farm. Hurry find them before they freeze outside!

name: College Bball Coach 2
description: Be the Coach in this complete college basketball simulation game!

name: Escape & Avenge
description: Escape and Avenge is an unconventional text-based adventure that reimagines the genre for mobile. With a couple quick taps, you can chain together any command you want--the perfect blend of speed, accuracy, and range of actions! Throw in some minimalist visual mini games and puzzles and you’ve got a new spin on interactive fiction!

name: Folded Flyer
description: Paper planes have never soared like this before! Guide your paper glider through a colorful world full of danger and secrets to uncover. Innocent kitchen counters and coffee tables become challenging obstacles for your paper flyer. With lots to explore and hidden collectibles to find, you're set for a fun airborne adventure!

name: Forklift Extreme Simulator
description: Forklift Extreme simulator 2022 gives you the complete physics challenge and handling feeling adventure that you ever wanted. Ride in the warehouses and pick up the pallets to place them in required locations on different shelves and heights. Sometimes you will need to do multiple drop-off and pickups in this incredible forklift challenge 3D simulator.

name: Go Go Redball
description:
It's a really simple game: there are a few rooms to bounce the ball in, each offers a unique mini-game and a different colored ball. In some the ball bounces with a different sound, as it would in reality (sounds were hand recorded using dozens of different rubber balls on several different surfaces).
That simplicity is the heart of Go Go Redball. Bouncing a ball is soothing and relaxing, allowing the mind to wander. As it does, creativity takes over. It's a great way to relive stress or solve nagging problems.

name: Hockey Puck Juggling
description: Play for your country. Collect points and compete with players all over the world. All Sochi 2014 teams are included.

name: Hoppy Frog 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Licence
description: Having reached number 2 in the charts, the global hit, Little Licence, is back and better than ever!

name: Loop Drive
description:
Loop Drive is a simple but challenging driving/racing game where all you have to do is drive in circles, keep your car safe and avoid any crash.
Watch out for other cars, control your speed, avoid crash and earn points for every circle your car does.

name: Basketball Party Shot
description: Basketball Party Shot is a multiplayer dunk shot game with ability to play up to 8 players on one device. Play with your friends or become a basketball star in arcade mode!

name: The Healing
description:
Out of the blue, you’re added to a group chat by Dr. Crow, an ominous person in the guise of a plague doctor. For some inexplicable reason, it's impossible for you to leave this chat.
You’re added to a mysterious group chat with 7 others you don't know. While you're figuring out what the group is all about, Dr. Crow – an ominous stranger with a plague doctor mask – suddenly appears!
Initially you take the situation casually, but suddenly a real psycho terror begins! Creepy dolls and symbols randomly appear at your house. You receive shocking video calls and mysterious clues.

name: Orphans
description:
A group of friends sets out to an abandoned orphanage that is surrounded by dark rumors and tales to record more footage for their “Lost Places” channel.
A group of friends are looking for a new location for their Lost Places YouTube channel. During their research, they come across an abandoned orphanage, which is surrounded by many spooky legends. Once they get to the location, one of the group members finds your phone number and you become part of the group. Within minutes you're right in the middle of the action. Coincidence – or not?

name: NervBox
description: NervBox is a VR, physics-based, multiplayer sandbox where players can experience an unparalleled level of co-op interaction and combat.

name: Summer Dino
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Sim World 3: US Passenger Bundle
description: Celebrate American rail with the Train Sim World 3: US Passenger Bundle! Experience the blinding speed of the Northeast Corridor aboard rail icons such as the NJ TRANSIT ALP-46, MBTA F40PH-3C and Amtrak's Acela and ACS-64! Featuring Training Center and 2 routes, as well as Amtrak's Acela!

name: Train Sim World 3: US Super Bundle
description: Celebrate American rail with the Train Sim World 3: US Super Bundle! Experience the best that the US has to offer, from the blinding speed of the Northeast Corridor to the towering freight passes of Wyoming and California. Featuring Training Center and 4 routes, as well as Amtrak's Acela!

name: Train Sim World 3: US Freight Bundle
description: Celebrate American rail with the Train Sim World 3: US Freight Bundle! Experience the best that the US has to offer, the towering freight passes of Wyoming and California await. Featuring Training Center and 2 routes, as well as the Union Pacific Heritage Collection!

name: Pocket Academy Zero
description:
Congratulations on your enrollment!
Help your students succeed and make your school famous!

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The story begins when a group of islands called Kark Isles appear near Ryza's—the protagonist's—hometown. Seeing this as a threat to their home, Ryza and her friends investigate the isles and discover ruins with a huge gate. Just as Ryza approaches the gate, a strange voice echoes in her head, telling her to reach the Code of the Universe. What is it that lies beyond the gate, and what does the "Code of the Universe" mean? In hopes of finding a way to save their home, Ryza and her friends set off on a great adventure that revolves around a Key and the roots of alchemy.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Keio 3000 & Asanogawa 8800 Series
description: The Keio 3000 series was a DC electric multiple unit (EMU) train type operated by Keio Corporation on the Keio Inokashira Line in Japan from 1962 until 2011. This pack features the Keio 3000 Series Narrow Body 4 car sets and Asanogawa Railway 8800 Series 2 car sets.

name: SoulCalibur VI: Deluxe Edition 2019
description: The SoulCalibur VI: Deluxe Edition includes SoulCalibur VI and all DLC characters.

name: Drug Prince & Narcotic Girl
description: Mobile otome game by Coly.

name: Train Sim World 3: Northeast Corridor - Boston: Providence Route
description: Experience the fastest rail line in America, from modern suburbia to sprawling countryside, linking the state capitals of Massachusetts and Rhode Island in command of both Amtrak and MBTA Commuter operations with Northeast Corridor: Boston-Providence!

name: Train Sim World 3: Cajon Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Dongeng Bayang Kulit
description: Dongeng Bayang Kulit is a turn-based RPG that is loosely based on Southeast Asian folklore. You play as the recently ship-less, Captain N'man and his mystical guide, Putri Matami as they travel in search for answers regarding a mysterious apparition that has taken to incessantly haunting N'man.

name: TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - Giselle's Costume Set
description: This DLC contains 4 additional costumes for Giselle, themed around her Street Casual and Trench Coat.

name: Purple War: Extra Mission Pack 1 - Prelude of War
description: Veiled stories of two factions Elf and Orc, their stories will finally be revealed. This DLC contains 5 missions of Elf and 5 missions of Orc.

name: Anarchy: RedLine Skin Set
description: RedLine Skin Set

name: Dragonlance Prudence Skin & Feat Pack
description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Corazón Skin & Feat Pack
description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Egbert Skin & Feat Pack
description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Dob Skin & Feat Pack
description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Merilwen Skin & Feat Pack
description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Rust Skin & Feat Pack
description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Train Sim World 3: NEC - New York: Trenton
description: Experience the City that never sleeps. From the Big Apple to New Jersey suburbs, non-stop action awaits aboard premier electric traction. Serve the East Coast well with NJ transit and Amtrak passenger equipment.

name: No Man's Sky: Fractal
description:
The 4.1 update for No Man's Sky brings a number of Quality of Life fixes, and mainly PSV2 support.

This update includes a great number of general VR Fixes but also includes a resizing of the players Ship garage to 12, a new Style of "skimmer" ship and a new Utopia Expedition

name: Xicatrice
description: Around 100 years since superpowers awakened in society, the Anti-Abnormal Unusual Talent Team (AUT) was created to prevent incidents caused by those wrongly using their powers. However, as these efforts became strained, the Reserve Anti-Unusual Talent Team (RAUT) was then formed to assist in tackling such conflict. This group is made up of the aforementioned students. Now, in 2023, the protagonist is a former member of the AUT who lost their powers after an unknown incident.

name: Gummy Dummy Battles
description:
Gummy Dummy Battles is the craziest battle simulator in the history of video games!
Once the fight begins, you can stand and watch as a spectator or take the field and fight in the first or third person.

Although the units are quite unconventional, each has its own strategic role: to dominate the enemy, you must discover their strengths and weaknesses.

name: Green Oddities
description: Green Oddities is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame, a point and click horror game. Created by the Radiance Team, the game, and the entirety of the series, was intended to be a joke and not to be taken seriously. This fangame is followed by its direct sequel and final chapter, Blue Oddities. The game turned out to be a "troll game," as there is no real gameplay aside from being a 2d free-roam game.

name: Who Are Ya
description: Each day brings a new footballer to guess in this unique football quiz

name: The Purgatory and the Stolen Souls
description: Welcome to The Purgatory and The stolen souls, in this game you will experience the exciting adventure of Baby against Springtrap... in space!

name: Christmas with Freddy's
description: It's Christmas! It is exciting, isn't it? I'm so hyped for my gifts, the animatronics from Fazbear Entertainment! I'm going to play with them all day! It's a shame I won't sleep anymore.

name: Artemis: Book One
description: Artemis is a visual novel intended for the adult audience. You begin your road to recovery three years following a traumatic event, where you'll eventually find yourself shaping the technological future.

name: Milfy City
description: Milfy City is an adult Visual Novel where you play as a young student who finds himself in the school therapist office, after a humiliating moment with another teacher at school. While plotting his revenge, he'll romance other characters at the school and at home.​

name: Loopy Ball
description: Fun little game where you must avoid the spikes to live longer.

name: Awesome Asteroids
description:
Awesome Asteroids pays homage to the arcade classics of the time and enhances the gameplay to a full 3d experience.

You'll blast through waves of asteroids using lasers, rockets, and gatling guns while trying to keep bases and other structures from taking damage. Grab shield power ups to charge your shields which will protect you from asteroids and mines. You’ll need to take out enemy ships before they can destroy your bases while avoiding their defenses.

name: Antigravity Racing
description: Enter your antigravity racecraft vehicular and engage in thrilling combat races and get the podium at any costs! Use the power ups to your advantage and use pads to activate your stun gun, missiles or boosters to get to the finish line first! Neckbreaking race circuits are waiting to be raced on in high speed antigravity racecrafts. Choose between 10 different racecrafts each with its advantages and disadvantages. Upgrade your vehicle to your personal fit and create the ultimate winning machine! Race on!

name: Harvest Them
description: You are the sole necromancer living in the surrounding forest of a small village. You have remained dormant for many years but your hunger has awakened you and you must feed on the souls of the living. You gather souls within your Wellheart and must not let it be destroyed. The surrounding area is filled with monsters that come out at night. They will be drawn towards your Wellheart, and attempt to destroy it. Villagers hide at night and move about during the day. The village lies to the south east of your Wellheart. There are four monster dens around the forest. Defend your Wellheart at night and feed during the day.

name: Track & Field
description: A Track & Field game released as a tie-in to the Barcelona Olympic Games (but not officially licensed by the Olympics Comitee).

name: Quarth
description: Famicom port of Block Hole.

name: Quarth
description: MSX port of Block Hole.

name: Quarth
description: Unlicensed Master System port of the MSX version of Quarth (Block Hole).

name: Lucky Paradox
description: Lucky Paradox is a harem focused adult visual novel with a mysterious and puzzling Story. You will also find loads of cuteness, love, and passion.

name: Abyss of Fire
description: A peaceful kingdom is frozen by the curse of the ice witch Kione. The mysterious girl "Laila" who appeared from somewhere and the mysterious spirit "Flara" who appeared from somewhere head to the kingdom to solve the curse of the kingdom together!

name: The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story
description:
Developed by Digital Sun, creators of Moonlighter, The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story is an action RPG that takes place in the League of Legends universe. In the kingdom of Demacia, the Mageseekers hold the power to oppress magic-using citizens in the name of public order–by inducting and indoctrinating them, locking them away, or driving them into hiding.

Play as Sylas, a spell-stealing mage who has just broken free of his unjust captivity at the Mageseekers’ hands. Wielding the chains that once bound you, you must liberate your homeland from tyranny, one Mageseeker at a time.

name: Box Office Boss
description: Box Office Boss puts you in charge of your own movie studio. The studio will rise or fall on the back of your executive decisions. Everybody thinks they could make a good movie, but do you have what it takes to turn that dream into box office success?

name: Parasite Black
description: Parasite Black is a mature, dark fantasy adult RPG sandbox game, with turn-based combat and VN style sandbox exploration, set in the world of Mirnos, a world under the fierce onslaught of a dangerous, bizarre race known as the Demorai.

name: What A Legend
description: What A Legend is a hand-drawn sandbox adult visual novel with 2D animations and a large cast of female characters to seduce and romance. You play as a young man who has a special gift that might be the key to save the kingdom from its corrupt leaders.

name: Muffins on Stream
description:
"Muffins on Stream" is an engagement game based on a video game in development called"Muffin Tour Legacy" that brings the fantasy world of Flourden to life on Twitch. As a streamer, you will use assets from "Muffin Tour Legacy" to create an interactive experience for your viewers, allowing them to join in on the fun and compete against each other in real-time.

The game is designed to be a fun, in-between game that can be played during live streams or as a giveaway for your viewers. Players will need to navigate the world of Flourden, uncovering clues and secrets about the "baker dust" and its potential to unleash great power and evil. With fast-paced gameplay, an engaging story

By purchasing "Muffins on Stream" on Steam, players will not only be able to enjoy the game but also support the development of the full game "Muffin Tour Legacy". The funds generated from the sales of "Muffins on Stream" will be used to further develop the game, improve its graphics and gameplay, and add new features and content. Additionally, the success of "Muffins on Stream" on Steam will help demonstrate the potential popularity of "Muffin Tour Legacy" and attract additional funding to bring the full game to fruition.

More about the game we want to make: In Muffin Tour Legacy, players take on the role of Molly, a skilled baker who owns the popular "Muffin Legacy" shop in the fantasy world of Flourden. Known for her exceptional muffin-making skills, Molly's world is turned upside down when a mysterious old man appears in her shop and offers her a rare ingredient called "bake dust" that can make her baking taste out of this world, but with the wrong usage, it can cause great evil.

As Molly embarks on a quest to save the universe from the Evil Bearclaw King and his pastry army, players will have to navigate the dangerous world of Flourden, uncovering clues and secrets about the "baker dust" and its potential to unleash great power and evil. Along the way, players will encounter various colorful characters and challenging obstacles as they strive to become the ultimate muffin-making hero. With fast-paced gameplay, an engaging story, and a unique fantasy setting, Muffin Tour Legacy offers players an unforgettable gaming experience.

name: Lemmings
description: This port of Lemmings is mostly on par with the original graphically. However, there is a slight downgrade in overall quality and color, most notably with the UI. The music has also been reproduced for the available sound cards, eliminating sample-based sounds (including the vocal sfx). The intro has also been cut entirely. This version was released as a 5.25" floppy disk, 3.5" floppy disc, and as a CD-rom

name: Lemmings
description: The ZX Spectrum port of Lemmings features major graphical and audio downgrades due to system limitations, as were the norm with this system. The intro is also cut entirely.

name: Slither.io
description: slither.io, a top-10 app on the App Store and the Google Play store, is finally coming to the arcade! The hit game is now available as a multiplayer arcade game with a giant 55″ display and 3 player positions in a compact cabinet to maximize operator revenue and location appeal. As one of the most popular games currently and building on the massively successful base, the arcade version features exclusive game play features that keep players engaged and entertained.

name: The Arson Betrayal
description:
The Arson Betrayal is a choice-driven and story-focused action-thriller visual novel. Players are given the opportunity to choose which girls they wish to pursue a relationship with, as they spiral down towards the center of a deadly conspiracy.
As the story goes, you'll discover the girls' different kinks and be given the chance to determine how your relationship with them progresses, romantically or otherwise.
A majority of your choices and conversations with characters throughout the story are remembered and may affect the story as you go forward.

name: Multibowl
description: Multibowl is a two-player challenge of skill and knowledge, across exciting moments in over 300 historical games across dozens of hardware platforms. It’s the first video game collage, maybe.

name: Ripples
description: Ripples is a story-focused sci-fi adult visual novel that centers around an 18-year-old in his last year of high school as he tries to balance his romantic life with his secret one.

name: Pale Carnations
description: Pale Carnations is an adult visual novel focusing on the life of a student who recently got a job at a gentleman's club. As you get to know its patrons and workers, you realize that this job might not have been all that it was set up to be.

name: Detuned
description: An eerie anti-rhythm hiden-object roguelike. Avoid a procedurally generated song. Look for pearls in a surreal wonderland. Experience hyperacusis from the comfort of your seat.

name: Fox Girl Taming
description: What kind of changes will happen to the cute little fox after you bring it home? Domestication Project - Transformation of Foxes!

name: Airplane Parking Mania 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Planet Fights
description: An online MMO game in which you can have your own virtual life. You can join a nation, buy vehicles, items, properties, open a political party, fight in battlefields, participate in races, take part in agent fights, be a nation senator or president, vote on nation issues and you can do many other activities.

name: Fabby Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Lumberjack Construction Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Mani Mouse
description: Sin descripción

name: Tik Tak Caro
description: Sin descripción

name: MurMur
description: MurMur is a story about love and lust in our lives, about what their absence leads to and what forms they can take. In this game, you'll be playing as a 28-year-old guy who gets involved in unexpected mystical events.

name: Jump Barrel
description:
Jump Barrel is a challenging platform game where players have to hide in barrels and escape from underground prisons. To overcome various obstacles, players need to rotate the barrel and jump from side to side, which requires a lot of skill and experience because it can slip on the move.

Jump Barrel, an easy-to-learn control, is an accessible game, but it requires delicate skills to escape. I highly recommend it to challenging platform game fans.

name: Divimera
description: Divimera is an adult visual novel/dating sim game with point-and-click and sandbox gameplay. It is set in a Victorian fantasy world inspired by the work of H.P. Lovecraft and contains strong language, some elements of horror and a lot of pornographic images and animations.

name: CubeDood in the Memory Snatcher
description: The evil CubeTop has taken away the memories of the world, and has created a path of evil and chaos! Play as CubeDood as you fight through 40 difficult levels as you try to stop CubeTop!

name: Hand Held Boggle
description: Sin descripción

name: World Class Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Stattogories
description: IMDb, Google, Spotify, Wikipedia or YouTube. All these higher or lower games are as fun as each other!

name: Furry Futa
description: There are Furry-girls with a twist here! Let's get weird.

name: Bubble Bust Extreme
description:
Bubble Bust Extreme is the most addictive bubble matching game.
It’s very easy to play, just tap on the screen to shoot the bubble. But it’s really hard to pass all 180 challenge levels. Try to match as many same color bubbles together as you can for extra points.

name: DJMax Respect V: Ez2on Pack
description: Now enjoy the songs of Ez2on in DjMax Respect V.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes in Defiance Battlepack 2
description: Heroes in Defiance Battle Pack 2 takes you to May 1940, and the Germans launched Fall Gelb (Case Yellow). Scores of German divisions flooded through the Ardennes and across the borders of France, Belgium, and Holland.

name: Turbo 84
description: Can you reach 100 mph? How about 200 mph? Drive as fast as you can through this insane lane changing game. Just try not to crash on your way to reaching your top speed!

name: Numolition
description:
Set up... add up... and blow up!
An explosively addicting puzzle game starring Anique and her crew of demolition experts. With its unique, clever gameplay, cast of wacky characters and comic style, Numolition is a guaranteed blast for the whole family!

Your job is simple: flatten as many constructions as you can by setting up, adding up and blowing up the numbers 1 to 9 through loads of mind-bending levels, bonus challenges, endless towers and other unlockable game modes that offer endless replayability.

name: Turtle Evolution
description: Dude, it’s time to chill out! It’s time to leave all the rush behind you and enjoy the most relaxed version of the Evolution series: the turtles are finally here! Get ready to embrace all the peace of mind of the wisest animals on earth (and sometimes in the undersea world too)!

name: After Gym
description: Use different ingredients and make potions to help athletes become supergiants.

name: Stickman Pixel Archer
description:
Massive enemy armies are coming with ultimate weapons. You are the last surviving archer on a mission to defeat all who stand in your way. Pick your ancestors' most precious and powerful bow to take them down. Archery with fire, ice, or poison, it's your choice. Bring a painful and quick death to the enemy.

The game is simple: Drag and drop to shoot arrows. Try to shoot straight in the head for instant victory. Four power-ups can help you in the battle: Heal, Shield, Arrow Shower, and Teleport.

Be careful, your enemies are training every day, and make sure your gear is upgraded.

name: The Crew: Extreme Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Assassin's Creed Unity: Secrets of the Revolution
description: The Revolution is not over, the people of Paris still need your help.

name: Putridum Horror
description: Putridum - Psychological dark horror in which the player will have to explore a large dark hous with only a weak flashlight, look for the right things, not be caught and find a way to escape from there.

name: Dinosaurs Dominion
description: Fight and Conquer! Dinosaurs Dominion is a Souls Like, 3rd Person, Action RPG where you play as a dinosaur in an ever changing world. Fight your way to victory and make the world your dominion.

name: Farming Simulator 23
description:
From plowing to harvesting to selling your products, Farming Simulator 23 invites players to take control of their own farm to build an agricultural empire! The latest edition of the internationally acclaimed Farming Simulator franchise opens a whole new chapter: More machines from real brands, two maps, new crops and animals, seasonal visual effects and production chains offer seemingly endless open-world gameplay in a familyfriendly environment.
