Players choose the kind of farmers they want to be, whether cultivating fields, logging with forestry equipment, or tending to farm animals such as the newly added chicken. Production chains extend the business allowing players to sell products like bread, olive oil or furniture. The improved tutorial mode, AI helper and the new auto-load feature for logs and pallets support the players in their farming career.

name: DiktaPunk: Fighting for Dominance
description:
"DiktaPunk: Fighting for Dominance" A game where you can embody your favorite character or the worst to fight against your opponent, will you be more Joe Biden, Kim Jong-un or Vladimir Putin?

In Diktapunk, Fighting for Dominance, every character is unique and has its strengths and weaknesses.
Be ready to fight with the all-time most powerful (dangerous, craziest, creepiest, Bring-Your-Own-Adjective here...) people of this world. From Kim to Biden, passing by Zelensky or Putin, discover their style and secret techniques to win. Play the piano with your member, use an AK47, make a cringey speech, or dance Gangnam Style on a giant rocket: the choice is yours and there's a lots more to discover!

name: Age of Empires III: Collector's Edition
description:
In this highly anticipated next installment in the Age of Empires franchise from Ensemble Studios, Age of Empires III places players in the time period of roughly 1500–1850, picking up where Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings left off. As players work to establish their empire, they take on the role of a European power struggling to explore, colonize, and conquer North and South America.

Age of Empires III introduces exciting new gameplay elements, including the all-new Home City and an incredible combat system. Players have new civilizations to discover, random maps to conquer, and a single-player campaign unlike any other. Players also find stunning graphics as a result of a revolutionary graphics engine that pushes the limits of PC graphics technology in an entirely new way.

name: Rada Quest
description: Rada Quest TCG is a game that combines real-time strategy and card collecting. You can produce resources in your realm, power up your deck, and earn exclusive rewards in events and quests.

name: Ghost: AC-130 Close Air Support
description: You are the gunner of the AC-130 Gunship. One of the most lethal war machines ever made. Use your skill with thermal optics and three of the biggest and most lethal guns ever produced to stop the enemy cold. This is a mindless shooter. A game to zone out with. Relax, and destroy.

name: Existence: The Outer Reach
description: Existence is a grand RTS that puts you in command of an empire that is expanding across the galaxy. Colonize planets by building bases and extracting valuable resources to build your forces. Attack enemy colonies on planets with mechs and native wildlife. Fight for space superiority with your fleets. Explore the galaxy to discover new planets that offer unique wildlife that can be trained. Monopolize rare minerals to build the devastating weapons capable of exterminating an entire planet.

name: Linkito
description: Unleash your creativity with Linkito! Connect blocks to solve unique puzzles and create your own masterpieces. A sandbox puzzle game with endless possibilities. Join the Linkito community and share your puzzles with the world.

name: Legion Saga
description: Part one of a trilogy heavily inspired by the Suikoden series, with regards to setting, theme, as well as the gameplay systems of recruiting characters into your army, governing a castle and engaging in large-scale battles.

name: Marvel Putt Golf II
description: Sin descripción

name: Fukuwarai no Oni
description: Sin descripción

name: Exon
description: Sin descripción

name: Chests, City, Clicker
description: The principle is simple, the more time you spend, the richer you will be, you can do nothing and get money, but the decisions you make will allow you to get even more!

name: Aura Battler Dunbine: Byston Well's Flame
description: Sin descripción

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Redemption
description:
Marvel's Midnight Suns: Redemption is the third DLC expansion for Marvel's Midnight Suns. This expansion introduces new story content centred around the character Venom, who becomes a playable hero. The DLC follows Venom's redemption arc after being corrupted by Lilith in the base game.

The expansion adds new missions where players can explore Venom's unique abilities and combat style, which includes powerful symbiote-based attacks. It also includes new enemies and challenges that fit into the overarching narrative of battling Lilith's demonic forces. As with other DLCs in Midnight Suns, "Redemption" further expands the roster of Marvel heroes and deepens the tactical options available to players.

name: The Foglands
description: Run into the unknown, fight monsters, scavenge loot, and try to make it back before you are swallowed by the fog. The Foglands is an atmospheric roguelike adventure where you’ll discover new paths and uncover old secrets.

name: Synapse
description: Combine brutal and tactile firepower with surging telekinetic abilities as you dive into a hostile mindscape. Harness this lethal combination and master your own combat style as you dive deeper into a surreal world. Launch, levitate, and smash your enemies through destructible environments using motion controls and eye tracking-assisted aiming.

name: Journey to Foundation
description: Journey to Foundation embodies the mission you’ll embark on that will reshape an empire. In this story-rich world, players are plunged into an epic journey through an area of space called The Periphery, where relationships will be strained, loyalties will be tested, and they must decide which factions will rise and fall. In this game, the future is in your hands.

name: Sabnack
description: Sin descripción

name: Shell Song
description: Shell Song is an interactive audio-narrative game about deep-fake voice technologies and the datasets that go into their construction. By considering physical and digital bodies and voices, it asks what a voice is worth, who can own a human sound, and how it feels to come face to face with a ghost of your body that may yet come to outlive you.

name: Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections
description: The next exciting entry in the STORM series, celebrating the 20th anniversary of Naruto's anime debut, releases 2023! The game features new playable characters in addition to the 124 ninjas from past series! Plus, it connects key moments from the first four STORM entries into one game for the first time.

name: Air Combat II
description: Sin descripción

name: The Foretold: Westmark Legacy
description:
The Foretold: Westmark Legacy is Horror Deck Building game inspired by H. P. Lovecraft.

Fight to investigate another day in this gothic horror adventure card game. Equip items and relics. Buy cards and use them wisely to survive what lurks in the darkest corners of town. Take a short and mind-bending dive into the unknown with a cozy horror atmosphere.

name: Lemmings
description: This version of Lemmings saw a reduction from 16-bit to 8-bit, reducing the graphics and sound quality by a considerable amount. SFX are also completely absent, and the intro cutscene has been cut.

name: A Corgi's Cozy Hike
description: Em-bark on a therapeutic adventure as a Corgi exploring a peaceful island getaway. Climb the mountain, soar the sky, and sail the seas to uncover treasures and cozy spots. No need to rush. Relax and savor this bite-sized, open-world experience while 10% of your purchase is donated to animal shelters.

name: 50 Rounds
description: A round based zombie killing experience. Each wave will be harder than the last with bosses showing up at possibly the worst of times. Good luck you will need it.

name: Mortal Kombat 1
description: A new era has begun. It's In Our Blood. Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat Universe created by Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and Fatalities!

name: King War
description: Who can be the last king in the dogfight between the countries of the earth and aliens? A pixel-style real-time strategy game, a simple and easy experience for placing units

name: Doomsday Survivors
description: Doomsday Survivors is a doomsday survival rogue bullet hell shooting game. You can choose a variety of characters and choose different weapon combinations to pass the level. Super fast-paced game style, every game can bring you a different experience!

name: I.S.A. Calendar Photoshoot 2023
description: Good day. Today you will be playing the role of a renowned photographer. The International Space Agency has commissioned you to photograph a team of astronauts to publish a charity calendar for 2023.

name: Blue Wednesday: Prologue
description: An experience filled with stories and music See the world through the eyes of jazz pianist, Morris. takes you through a dream-like adventure through jazz and love, and failure.

name: Once Upon a Tower
description: Have you ever tried to escape somewhere? Ever feel like you're in a tower? Ever see yourself waiting for a brave knight to rescue you? No more waiting! Because he's not coming, baby... No, really, he's not coming. He was literally devoured by that dragon over there. But fear not, you have everything you need to break free. The brave knight left the warhammer behind. You can use it, can't you? You can wipe out enemies. You can run away from the dragon. This time the adventure starts in a tower.

name: Chick Flick
description: Use your trusty trampoline to bounce the chicks back to the safety of the nest.

name: Adventures of Helio
description: Adventures of Helio is a 2D platformer with a dark fantasy setting inspired by Central America. Fight scary enemies, overcome tough challenges, discover powers, and more through 60 levels.

name: Battle Crush
description: The beginning of an explosive action brawl! Battle Crush is an action-packed game with simple controls and intense battles. Smash your enemies with spectacular skills in this electrifying arena filled with explosive energy!

name: Blocky Balloons
description: Blocky Balloons is a block-pushing "sokoban-like" puzzle game. Push, slide, and undo your way through 40+ puzzles to get those balloons!

name: Arcade Paradise: Summer of Sports
description: On your marks, get set, go! Compete in the Summer of Sports to become the most decorated athlete in the arcade. Break and set new records in this button mashing and joystick waggling classic.

name: Arcade Paradise: Penguin Push
description: Waddle and hop your way around your enemies, utilising power blocks and platforms to flip the script on the invaders and stop them in their tracks, just be careful of stray birds, cold waters, and angry walruses that haven't been disposed of - there's no fury like a walrus scorned!

name: Arcade Paradise: Coin-Op Pack 2
description:
Level up your arcade with the Coin-Op Pack 2! Featuring three BRAND NEW cabinets to put in your arcade, with new daily challenges and arcade games to keep your customers pumping quarters!

Includes the ‘R.O.G.E.R', ‘Penguin Push' and ‘Summer of Sports' DLC.

name: Frail Hearts Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Paradise: R.O.G.E.R.
description: Strap yourself in and prepare to enter the danger zone! You are Rocket and Ordinance, Guidance and Evasion Robot 2.0 (Or R.O.G.E.R for short) - your mission? To survive waves of deadly missiles and push your aerial evasive abilities to the limit!

name: UFO Robot Grendizer: The Feast of the Wolves
description: For the first time in the video game history, climb aboard Grendizer the Legendary Robot and fight the forces of evil to defend our planet Earth!

name: Fastlaners
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Don Doko Don
description: "DON DOKO DON" is a fixed-screen action game released by TAITO in 1989. Take control of the old lumberjacks Bob and Jim to progress through a variety of tricky stages. Pick up items to power up, beat the boss at the end of each ROUND, and rescue the captive king and princess!

name: Blood Bowl 3: Imperial Nobility Edition
description: The Emperor obviously expects his players to look very distinguished. Stand out from the rabble with the Imperial Nobility Edition. It includes customization Items for a Blitzer, Ogre and Thrower.

name: Catan: Console Edition Deluxe
description: Acquire resources, master new strategies, and build your settlements across a board that comes to life. Challenge friends in your living room or play against smart & dynamic AI to become the winning Catanian, then take these skills online with full cross-play compatibility! Take your challenge to the next level with the Deluxe edition which includes 5 previous Catan World Championship board layouts.

name: Ghost Blitz
description: Become a "Ghost Blitz" World Cup Champion! The world-famous game “Ghost Blitz”, played by millions of people, is now available for the smartphone and tablet!

name: SenSense
description:
SenSense is a three player escape-room-inspired puzzle game.

Three players. No more, no less. You cannot play SenSense alone. Don't have two friends handy? No problem! You don't need to be in the same physical location, you just need visual and audio contact. Connect via group video chat on another device and you're good to go.

Without the room! SenSense does not try to copy a physical room in any way. Rather, it focuses on the multiplayer and puzzle solving aspects of an escape game: you get to feel the manic shared energy as you race the clock to piece together clues, in search of those satisfying "aha" moments when everything clicks into place.

SenSense is a series of multiplayer challenges. In each challenge, each player will receive a different piece of the same puzzle. You will need to work together to solve it. Each of you is essential to the solution. Oh, and one last thing… one of you can't hear; one of you can't see; one of you may not speak.

name: Gyrotate
description:
Gyrotate is an innovative action-puzzle game. It's amazingly simple yet insanely addictive, once you start playing you won’t be able to stop!
Rotating the layers on the board offers a unique spin on the puzzle-match genre. Matching has never been more fun or addictive!

name: Table Tennis League
description: Table Tennis League is the most realistic 3D Ping-Pong game.

name: Where is My Glasses ?
description: Direct a little fuzzy creature to find his glasses, because he could not see very well, but this will not be easy! You have to put the launcher in the right place, and every launcher have a way to use it, you should avoid the Red Blocks, and help him to find his glasses safely.

name: Flappy Nyan
description: Do you think that only a bird can flap it's wings and fly? Ask Nyan Cat for the answer in her newest adventure in Flappy Nyan! From isTom Games, the creators of the famous and succesful Nyan Cat series, comes Flappy Nyan which raises the bar higher than ever! Use your rhythm to tap Nyan Cat through her way between the pipes! Use various skins for your favorite cat, and watch her crumble in many funny ways! Listen to our new remixed Nyan music that makes the atmosphere more immersive. If You're looking for a challenge, Flappy Nyan is Your best choice You can make in isTom games's Nyan Cat series!

name: Creed: Rise to Glory - Championship Edition
description:
Immerse yourself in the pulse-pounding excitement of boxing with the cinematic thrill of a blockbuster movie, as you step into the ring as an aspiring boxing champion: train under Rocky Balboa, fight familiar and unexpected contenders across dynamic arenas, and establish your boxing legacy.

Championship Edition brings an enhanced and expanded experience for new and seasoned Creed players alike with additional game content, features, quality of life upgrades and PvP cross-platform support.

name: A Bird Called Mike
description:
Guide Mike and his friends home in this new fun and addictive game.
Test your skills as you fly and flip your way through different worlds and challenges. Gain points, unlock new levels and avoid the baddies. Simple addictive gameplay that will keep you entertained for hours!
The new hit game!

name: Bouncy Pirates
description:
It's Bouncy time! Don't let your pirates fall into the sharky sea. Make them bounce to Treasure Island and help them take their loot back into the ship. Do you want gold?
So Let's bounce Sailor!

name: Snake Walk
description:
Snake Walk is unique and very addictive puzzle game. Challenge your mind trying to find the right way through the maze!

Test your skills now with 100 unique levels. Solve each puzzle and unlock even more advanced levels. Can you finish the puzzles fast enough and get the maximum of 3 stars on every level!? Improve your logic skills while you spend hours of fun, playing Snake Walk!

name: Zombieland: Headshot Fever - Reloaded
description: Join the Zombieland crew as you take on zombie hordes against the clock. Headshot combos slow down time, meaning the most precise shooter is the fastest. Challenge the leaderboards with skill, speed, and accuracy.

name: Coffee Time!
description:
The programmer is sleepy, because he needs to drink a cup of coffee to boost his performance. Your job is to draw the line correctly to fill the cup with coffee, and make the programmer feel energetic again.
Try your own best way that works on each level, be creative and always think of new solutions. Some levels might seem difficult, but you can easily unlock them with a little effort.

name: Long Nose Dog
description: A game about the long nose borzoi dog. Be the best of all dogs and grow your nose far and beyond. Long Nose Dog is an endless running game where you play as a borzoi and stretch your nose through an amazing adventure. Eat all the chips and unlock your favorite dog. How long is your nose?

name: Soorimo River
description:
Up in the highest mountains lies the mystical land of Soorimo. The hidden valley is named upon Soorimo River, the sacred waters that span the border between the two ancient settlements. It's habitants constantly fight with each other for Soorimo's domination.
This fascinating card game challenges your strategic skills while it offers endless hours of fun with your friends! Your goal is to eliminate your opponents soldiers' cards in order to win the match and conquer Soorimo! A number of different soldiers, each one of them with different power, are at your disposal while battling. Based on your strategy you can focus on removing cards directly from the enemy's pile stock by approaching the enemy's base or destroy cards in the battle field by attacking. If you're strong enough to place two of your soldiers' cards in the opponent's base the victory is definitely yours.

name: The Game of Dots.
description:
"The Game of Dots" is based on an old, logical game that we used to play with pen and paper. The app for iOS brings you new, 3D experience in the world of friendly dragon Albert. Passing through the levels you help Albert to bring the colors back to his world...
Simple, but not easy, relaxing but sometimes irritating, addictive puzzle game.

name: The Long Siege
description: The Long Siege is a real-time match-three puzzle game with RPG elements set inside an extraordinary atmosphere of music and visuals. The core mechanic centers on matching items in your own tower through a mixture of belt-type scrolling and single taps to command your army. It’s a fun-to-play strategic thinking challenge requiring you to plan ahead to summon the right units, level up, upgrade your defences and complete the quests to unlock special items.

name: Hit n' Run: Highway Demolition
description: Anyone can drive, but only one can dominate the road. Destroy traffic and crush the police on your way to the top of mafia drivers. Select your fastest and most powerful vehicle to clear all the barriers on the street, evade police chases and compete with other players. Race your way through the highway and fight for survival. Drift through the streets, burn some asphalt, crash into traffic and plot a demolition course through your enemies.

name: 2 Lane Racers
description: Test your skills weaving through traffic. Control two cars at the same time, collect tools to upgrade cars. 20 cars to unlock, and more coming.

name: Boy & Wheel
description: Boy & Wheel is a combination of wheel and RPG. You play a boy and avenge father's blood. You will encounter terrible monsters on your way to avenge and fight with them desperately.

name: Pitch Invaders
description:
In the early 70s our world was invaded and humanity enslaved. Now all we do is entertain our overlords by playing every alien's favourite sport, and the best thing Earth had to offer, Football.
Pitch Invaders is an over-the-top football game where you play against other players online, or challenge your friends to a match.

name: Super Little Jogger
description:
Super Little Jogger is a fusion of nerve whacking avoider and endless runner.
Looking for a casual endless runner? Super Little Jogger is perfect for you! It’s super easy to play. Stop at the right time and run within the time gap! Patience is the key!

name: Fisherman Fisher
description: Embark on the ultimate adventure of the sea with Fisherman Fisher. Smith, Jones, or Miller, it doesn’t matter who you are. Just join the action! When are you going to start? Become the captain and travel the world with Fisherman Fisher!

name: Speed Basketball
description: "Speed Basketball" is an addictive basketball game, once you start, it is difficult to stop!

name: Freeze Whiz
description:
Get ready to experience this amazing penguin adventure game - Freeze Whiz with loads of fun. It is an addictive and casual game to play with a penguin character. The penguin's habitat is melting away due to climate change and you must save the penguin.
“Freeze Whiz” is a game where you have to allow the racing penguin to pass through obstacles on the frozen race track. The obstacles are pits or ice holes on which the penguin can fall and the game is over. You have to allow the racing penguin to smoothly pass through the frozen track by filling the ice pits with ice.

name: Brawlerz Zombies
description:
Brawlerz Zombies is a fast paced augmented reality action-shooter where you drive, boost, shoot and splat waves of hilarious zombies. Upgrade your vehicles and your weapons and take on the zombie hoards.
Intuitive controls allow for epic twitch-shooting speeds and tightly controlled driving. Rush to protect the Great Driver hologram and summon air strikes from drones.

name: Arms Evolution: Zombie Destroyer
description: "Arms Evolution: Zombie Destroyer" is a unique Roguelite tower defense game. You will slaughter thousands of zombies in the game and enhance your weapon towers through build character in the RPG way. and , the game also offers an idle mode, so you can enjoy building weapons anytime and anywhere.

name: Remembering/Not remembering Sin
description: Shunichi Sasaki, a young man who lost his past memories due to higher brain dysfunction, was criticized as a "murderer". Who was he really? Use memory notes to supplement his memories and explore his past.

name: Santa Goes Skiing
description:
It's snowy outside and Santa goes Skiing downhill !
Have fun in this amazingly simple ski game where
you have to doge the crazy obstacles and
collect presents for extra points!
Watch out for the animal life and don't slam into the trees!

name: Football Clash: Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Through the Hoop
description: Sin descripción

name: Brake Away
description:
A casual racing game for speed lovers! How long can you keep your cars going without crashing?
Buckle up and get your fingers ready to control multiple cars that never stop! Tap on the cars to slow them down, don't let them crash, and win coins to unlock new features.

name: Not Not 2
description: Enhance your Brain Skills by solving clever Puzzles based on orientation, logic and colors!

name: Way of the Hunter: Aurora Shores
description: Explore untouched Alaska nature with a rich population of wild animals like Kodiak bears, Roosevelt elk, Wood bison. Use a broad selection of firearms and equipment to get the best trophies and enjoy the open world habitats ranging from grasslands to mountains

name: Farming Simulator 23: Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Load up your Boltgun and plunge into battle headfirst! Experience a perfect blend of Warhammer 40,000, classic, frenetic FPS gameplay and the stylish visuals of your favourite 90’s retro shooters.

name: Tale of the Fallen Onmyoji
description: A visual novel game in which the protagonist, a member of a fallen Onmyoji family, finds his path and happiness by breaking the "curse" spread in the town with a kiss to the heroines."

name: Baldur's Gate 3: Collector's Edition
description:
Gather your party and prepare for the launch of Baldur's Gate 3 with the limited edition Baldur's Gate 3: Collector's Edition.

Each Collector's Edition contains a digital copy of the game, a custom sticker sheet, a 25cm Mind Flayer vs. Drow battle diorama, a 160-page hardcover art book, a cloth map of Faerûn, a set of D&D-inspired origin character sheets, a metal tadpole keyring, a Magic: The Gathering booster pack, a custom-engraved metal d20 based on the dice from Baldur's Gate 3, and a certificate of authenticity, all within a mind-flayer-inspired collector's box.

All of the Digital Deluxe Edition DLC content is also included with the Collector’s Edition, which gives you 72 hours Early Access, a unique dice skin, a collection of Divinity-inspired items, and the Adventurer’s Pouch, along with the digital downloadable OST, Artbook and Character Sheets. In addition, Collector’s Edition owners will receive an exclusive in-game skin based on the physical Metal D20.

name: Disaster Detective Saiga: An Indescribable Mystery
description: A tale of unnameable calamity by a fiercely unlucky detective! A comical occult horror adventure!

name: I Love You like a Fat Lady Loves Apples
description: I Love You like a Fat Lady Loves Apples is a thrilling casual game.

name: Dead Earth
description: A thrilling, first-person, action-survival game set in the modern post-apocalypse. As mankind's last hope, you'll traverse the hospital ravaged by a lethal plague. the fight for survival gets progressively more difficult as the story unfolds. Be ready for violence

name: Anti-Bully Adventure
description: You're a person who has been getting bullied online, then you find a comment that looks positive and decide to click the link attached. An evil virus corrupts your computer and you have to try to get rid of it. Will you be able to do it?

name: Hazard Horizon
description: Distant future. You are on a damaged space station with an unknown creature and dozens of panicked people. There are not enough resources for everyone, so you will have to work hard to survive and escape from this place.

name: Farmside
description:
Place plots, plant crops, harvest, and repeat. Build beautiful orchards filled with bountiful fruit trees and raise chickens, cows, and other animals who produce agricultural products.

Craft and cook unique recipes from your produce and fill orders from the local townsfolk and don't forget to stock up on seeds from Dunn’s seed stand.

name: Simple Increment
description: Simple but addictive idle clicker game for those who just wants to relax and have some fun.

name: Soko
description:
A teeny Sokoban for Playdate, packed with over 400 puzzles and the ability to load your own levels.

There are 7 unlockable characters to play with (plus one Catalog-exclusive bonus hero). Players can collect these characters by solving puzzles.

name: Don't Byte Your Tongue
description: Don’t Byte Your Tongue is a thrilling 8-bit retrowave platformer where you have to climb up multiple levels and overcome various obstacles to reach your robo-lover at the very top. This rage game/precision platformer will test your skills and patience as one wrong move can send you back to the very bottom. You can choose from different game modes to suit your preference and style. You can also show off your best times and rank up on the cross-platform leaderboard that features players from all over the world.

name: Dungeons and Doggos
description: Endless dog based platformer set in a fantasy world for #playdate

name: Bubble Bash 2
description: A mobile puzzle game by Gameloft.

name: Brain Challenge 3: Think Again!
description: A mobile puzzle game by Gameloft.

name: Detective Ridley and the Mysterious Enigma
description: A mobile puzzle game by Gameloft.

name: Abracadaball
description: A mobile puzzle game by Gameloft.

name: My Life in New York
description: "My Life in New York" is a mobile simulation game where players step into the shoes of a character trying to build a new life in New York City. The game focuses on navigating daily challenges like managing a career, social life, and finances. Players can explore the city, decorate their apartment, and make decisions that impact their virtual life. It’s a casual, life-simulation experience with a focus on personal growth and success in the bustling urban environment of NYC.

name: Date or Ditch 2
description: A romance mobile game by Gameloft.

name: High School Hook Ups
description: A romance mobile game by Gameloft.

name: Cannon Rats
description: An action game by Gameloft.

name: Block Breaker 3 Unlimited
description:
An arcade game by Gameloft.
Break on through to the next generation of Block Breaker! Experience deeper, more intricate levels that take you beyond a single screen full of blocks. Grab power-ups, trigger switches and blast through gateways to reach new areas as you push your way towards the top. Try to keep up with multiple balls on the same screen, or even multiple pads! The thrill never stops thanks to the level generator. Enemies and epic boss battles await you each step of the way, so stay focused and have a blast!

name: Motocross: Trial Extreme
description: A motocross game by Gameloft.

name: Platinum Solitaire 3
description: A solitaire game by Gameloft.

name: Midnight Bowling 3
description: A bowling game by Gameloft.

name: KO Legends
description: A mobile fighting game by Gameloft.

name: Lemmings
description: This unreleased prototype was a planned arcade machine that reached a playable build, but never released to the public. The good hardware allowed the game to run a little faster. The intro was also a little redone, and a tutorial slideshow was introduced to quickly show people the basics at an arcade. It was planned to release in 1991.

name: Wild West Guns
description: Cellphone port of Wild West Guns.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Definitive Edition
description: This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Little Kong: Jungle Fun - Premium Edition
description: This bundle includes 2 DLC: the Pink Fur and the Red and Blue Fur.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Ultimate Edition
description: The story begins when a group of islands called Kark Isles appear near Ryza's—the protagonist's—hometown. Seeing this as a threat to their home, Ryza and her friends investigate the isles and discover ruins with a huge gate. Just as Ryza approaches the gate, a strange voice echoes in her head, telling her to reach the Code of the Universe. What is it that lies beyond the gate, and what does the "Code of the Universe" mean? In hopes of finding a way to save their home, Ryza and her friends set off on a great adventure that revolves around a Key and the roots of alchemy.

name: The Good Life: Behind the Secret of Rainy Woods
description:
Elizabeth is alive, and no one remembers what happened in the Goddamn Hellhole, that is Rainy Woods. It's time to find out what’s really going on… And maybe enjoy some time in the countryside along the way.

Take on a slew of new side quests from the residents of Rainy Woods and come across some new faces along the way. Help them learn photography! Cook together! Set up secret dates! Save someone’s life...?

Well it’s time for Naomi to put that drink aside and put on her journalism hat once again!

This DLC includes 12 new side quests, with many secrets left to uncover…
Let's peek a bit further behind the curtain of Rainy Woods shall we?

name: Modern Combat 2: Black Pegasus
description: Cellphone port of Modern Combat 2: Black Pegasus.

name: Midnight Pool
description: Cellphone port of Midnight Pool.

name: Plunder Islands
description: A fast paced 2D platformer, Plunder Islands has you running, jumping and climbing for treasure. Are you ready for the challenges each island brings.

name: Millipede
description: Atari 2600 port of Millipede.

name: Missile Command
description: Atari 2600 port of Missile Command.

name: Hexceed: Finis
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Finis Puzzle your way through 143 new levels - levels include all mechanics from Years 1 and 2!

name: Sky Diver
description: Atari 2600 port of Sky Diver.

name: The Entity Within
description: The Entity Within is a echolocation Hardcore Stealth Horror game, each map has its story and each monster (called entities in the game) has different powers. Join this atmosphere and try your best.

name: She Wants Me Dead: Extended Edition
description: Along the base game, you also get access to 2 DLC: artbook and soundtrack.

name: Swords & Bones: Extended Edition
description: This bundle includes the Spooky Skin DLC.

name: Hexceed: Paenultima
description: Sin descripción

name: Dino Puzzler World
description: Dino Puzzler World is an awesome, interesting and family friendly puzzle game for every Dino Maniac!

name: Mul.Mash.Tab.Ba.Gal.Gal
description: Mul.Mash.Tab.Ba.Gal.Gal is a hand-animated underwater 2D action game, inspired by Pong and Breakout. Control two paddles, one on each side of the screen, to deflect bouncing energy balls into enemies.

name: Beetle Ju 2
description: Evil little creatures are invading Beetle Junior's world. Use your skill to defeat them in this side-scrolling adventure. To complete each level, you will need to destroy all the monsters on the level and save all the little bugs.

name: Class Reunion Chat Room
description: Amy receives an invitation to a group chat set up by some of her former classmates. Its purpose is to reconnect after all these years. But soon more and more disturbing facts about Amy's classmates are revealed, and Amy begins to fear that the people she's texting with may not be what they seem.

name: Super Breakout
description:
Atari 2600 port of Super Breakout.

In Super Breakout, there are three different and more advanced game types from which the player can choose: Double gives the player control of two bats at the same time—one placed above the other—and two balls. Losing a life occurs only when both balls go out of play, and points are doubled while the player is able to juggle both balls without losing either. Cavity retains the single bat and ball of Breakout, but two other balls are enclosed on the other side of the wall, which the player must free before they, too, can be used to destroy additional bricks. Points are increased for this, but triple points are available if the player can keep all three balls in play. Progressive also has the single bat and ball, but as the ball hits the paddle, the entire wall gradually advances downwards step by step, gaining in speed the longer the ball lasts in play.

name: Warlords
description: Atari 2600 port of Warlords.

name: SuperTripLand
description:
Welcome to SuperTripLand!

Join forces with players from around the world or engage in intense arena battles. Complete challenging quests, collect TripCoins, and visit the in-game shop to purchase items and upgrade your gameplay.

name: Ultra Blade
description: Defend Mankind's last city from the endless hordes of darkness! Ultra Blade is a horde survival RPG with rogue-lite progression elements. Build new heroes to take on new challenges while cutting through 1000s of foes at once. New heroes unlock new powers, making runs more dynamic the more you play.

name: Asteroids
description: Atari 5200 and Atari 8-bit ports of Asteroids. It was previously unreleased for the 5200.

name: Hunt: Showdown - The Penitent
description:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable:

- The Penitent (one Hunter)
- Delirium (one weapon)
- The Scourge (one weapon)
- False Sacrament (Regeneration Shot)

name: Hunt: Showdown - Live by the Blade
description:
Live by the Blade includes 4 new weapons -

-Farrier's Fist
-Reaper's Hand
-The Rasp
-Malice

name: Epic Assassin
description: Epic Assassin - Bad Dudes are invading the Realm. The Queen has hired an Epic Assassin to Kill Them.

name: Dance Fight
description: Dance Fight is a Beat 'em Up Brawler Game, Also with Cool Dance Moves !

name: Miniature Golf
description: A 5200 port of Miniature Golf.

name: Missile Command
description: Atari 5200 port of Missile Command.

name: RealSports Baseball
description: Atari 5200 port of RealSports Baseball.

name: RealSports Basketball
description: An Atari 5200 port of RealSports Basketball.

name: RealSports Football
description: Atari 5200 port of RealSports Football.

name: RealSports Tennis
description: Atari 5200 port of RealSports Tennis.

name: RealSports Volleyball
description: Atari 5200 port of RealSports Volleyball.

name: Star Raiders
description: Atari 2600 port of Star Raiders.

name: Snakebird Complete
description: A console version of Snakebird that contains both Snakebird and Snakebird Primer and some minor adjustments.

name: Super Breakout
description: Atari 5200 port of Super Breakout.

name: Tempest
description: Atari 2600 port of Tempest. It was previously unreleased.

name: Among Us: The Tragedy of Ryohyukan
description: There are imposters among us! Find them. Mark them. Stop them before they kill the entire crew of this spaceship.

name: Sex Advice Succubus
description: Sex Advice Succubus is a cozy mature chat simulator! You play as Qmin, a succubus who works for a company that provides advice to paying clients, with the goal of improving their sex life.

name: Number 94
description: A short experimental horror game about infra-red and the dangers beyond our perceived color spectrum.

name: Zanzlanz's Collector's Bundle
description:
A bundle of 11 arcade-like games, complete with a launcher that tracks all 100 achievements!
When you win, you get a sweet spot on a winner's leaderboard!

name: Trans Goetia
description:
Trans Goetia is a 18+ gender euphoric gay little adventure of trans girl named Circe losing her brain cells from dealing with the mischief making demon Fufu.

Circe gets introduced to the world of magic in exchange of being pestered as she gains squishy softness at a rate regular hormone therapy could never provide! Surely there are no demonic downsides!

This naughty story will be an episodic release, working towards a game where the player gets to nudge Circe towards specific kinks and consequences while even getting to help her decide what her ideal body will be.

name: Demon Dash
description: Somehow the world got taken over by demons because everyone was too gay. Despite the new demon overlords being a bit dangerous, most of them are just vibing and most humans got to continue their lives unaffected. After the general consensus came out that there was a niche for those who really liked demons, a dating and delivery app called demon dash was invented where people can sign up to be a lucky candidate to be picked up by a demon girl.

name: Supplementaries
description: Supplementaries is a highly configurable Forge mod focused on adding valuable content which fills the gaps vanilla has. Its features are tailored to be functional, aesthetically viable, and complementary to preexisting content and provide many new ways to enhance your Vanilla+ experience.

name: I.R.P. Intelligent Rackety Paradise
description: This is a game where you are set out to find the items needed to reach a new paradise.

name: The Man in the Park
description: You see a man in the park on your walk home. Will you help him?

name: Shield Blast
description: Planet Earth is running low on resources and your goal is to help the cargo spaceship, named Mother Ship, reach Planet Earth. You are in hostile territory and will be attacked by all kind of alien enemies such as flowers, mushrooms and weird Lovecraftian creatures.

name: Mind Ripple
description: This is a short, experimental, psychedelic platformer made by me (Lixian), the programmer, and my friend Gabriel Holtschlag, the artist, for the Global Game Jam 2018.

name: Ricochet Gun
description: Use your gun to destroy enemies, but make sure to aim properly or things might get out of control.

name: Damien: The Game
description: Damien: The Game is a game based on Markiplier's Damien YouTube Video.

name: The Warfstache Clicker
description: Warfstache Clicker is Lixian's second fan-made clicker-adventure video game played by Markiplier. It was gifted to Mark by Lixian for his 32ed birthday.

name: Stray: Iam8bit Exclusive Edition
description: A limited edition release of Stray which includes a special cover, poster, art cards, and a patch, released via iam8bit.

name: Monday Night Mania
description: What are you doing this FRIDAY? At NIGHT time, we will be getting FUNKIN on the DANCE floor! Who will be the best?

name: Sit and Spin Adventure
description: Originally intended as a proof of concept for a short adventure game, the first Sit and Spin Adventure's development quickly transformed into an experiment in found imagery collage and non-sequitur exploration. It was developed over the course of three months.

name: Sit and Spin Adventure 2: Truth - Reason: Second Final
description: The sequel built upon the themes seen in the first game, while also adding in new styles of gameplay and a greater number of locations and quests to complete. It was developed over the course of nine months and released on Valentines Day 2016.

name: Fracctal Monsters
description:
Fracctal Monsters is a play-and-earn virtual petcare game built on the Algorand Blockchain. It uses Algorand NFTs to simulate the growth and evolution of unique pets, and is a progression of classic Web2 games such as Neopets, Tamagotchi, and Webkinz.

If you are a fan of quality virtual pet games, then Fracctal Monsters is a must try.

name: Simple Solitaire
description: Enjoy the classic game of Solitaire on Windows. Simple Solitaire loads fast and is completely free. It works great on both your desktop and tablet computer running Windows. This game is just like the classic Solitaire that used to come with Windows.

name: Flappy Crush
description: The game is simple. Tap the screen to close the pipes and crush any birds trying to flap through!

name: Flappy Bird
description: Simply press the large red button to skillfully maneuver the bird through the openings in the pipes. Having the bird touch one of the pipes or the ground ends the game for the player. Earn tickets with each set of pipes that the bird successfully passes through. Players can compete for the daily high score or the all-time high score.

name: Polybius
description: Polybius is a PC game based on the urban legend of the same name. The game is a recreation of what the game would've looked like if it were to exist.

name: Chu Han Zheng Ba: War Between Chu and Han
description: Chu Han Zheng Ba: War Between Chu and Han is a turn-based strategy game created by Waixing in 1997. It is based on "Chu–Han Contention".

name: Stickman Archer Online
description: Stickman Archer is an action PvP battle game where you can fight with other stickmen and prove you're the best.

name: Quake
description: A cancelled Game Boy Advance port of Quake.

name: Frogger
description: Frogger is an unreleased Sega Game Gear game, developed by S-Plan and set to be published by Sega in 1991.

name: Superman: Battle for Metropolis
description: Superman: Battle for Metropolis is a cancelled Game Boy Color game.

name: Another Fisherman's Tale
description: Another mind-bending VR adventure in Another Fisherman's Tale, a poetic story with unique VR puzzle mechanics. Control limbs, solve puzzles, explore new locations & discover the truth. A follow-up to the award-winning A Fisherman's Tale.

name: NagiQ 2: Treasure Hunt
description: NagiQ 2 is a family-friendly, original and challenging word game! Conquer 75 boards full of fun with words! This time Nagi has found a treasure map and is now embarked on an adventure to conquer 5 islands and 75 boards full of fun with words! He’s after all of the treasures and a lot of coins! In NagiQ 2 you’ll enjoy an original gameplay based on combining words on boards to win coins, defeat an evil pirate, win prizes, punch evil skulls, explode monsters, trim mustaches and prove that you are the ultimate wizard of word games!

name: Raise
description: AI pet simulation game, developed by ABA Inc.

name: Meimu
description: Dungeon crawler role-playing game in which the main character battles various monsters through turn-based encounters and by solving trivia questions.

name: Mold
description: "Mold" is a short horror game inspired by 80's trash movies. Bringing unique tuning play and a vibe from the golden age of VHS tapes.

name: Panic on Ice
description:
Jessy is away on business, but a plane crash puts him in a desperate situation. Isolated in an inhospitable Alaskan environment, he will have to face the freezing cold and fight to survive.

In addition to the horrible situation in which he finds himself, he will still have to deal with cannibal maniacs...

name: Amaranth
description: Sin descripción

name: Deceit 2
description: Deceit 2 is an online social deduction horror game. Inspire fear as the Terror, play detective as the Innocent, or create mayhem as the Cursed. Trapped with friends and strangers: who can you trust to help you escape?

name: Memetric: Classic
description: It's a "side-scrolling" real-time strategy game, pixelart style, with a few small "rouge-lite" elements. You have to collect and farm creatures, various bizarre creatures, to further develop your territory and eventually defeat the evil force that has been organizing against you throughout the game.

name: Tennis Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Survival City
description: In Survival City, humanity's time is running out, and the only way to survive is by building a strong base and clashing with hordes of zombies every night. Your base is your fortress, and you must place traps, watchtowers, and weapons to defend against the zombie.

name: I will Blow up the Earth Muahahahahahahaha!!!
description: This is a game about a girl who wants to blow up the earth because she is very evil.

name: Gokichi-kun Series: Igo Nyuumon Doujou
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Depth
description: Sin descripción

name: Spotle
description: The incognito daily word puzzle.

name: Bayoen Syokin Sougaku 50,000 Yen Sohdatsu Quiz
description: Arle has some questions.

name: Car II: Grandprix
description: Sin descripción

name: Spirits
description: Topo Soft first game

name: Momo Horror Story
description:
Momo is a horror game based on the history of the message user "momo".

In the game, you will be a guy that contacts momo by message, and now he will be pursued by the monster of momo.

You will have to complete some tasks before get rescued, like turn on the generator, find some keys, close windows etc...

The objetive is to survive until the timer reachs 00:00 then, the police will arrive and you would able to escape.

There are two modes in game, Classic and Gun mode.

name: Warau Salesman 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Warau Salesman 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Embervale.TV
description:
Welcome to Embervale.TV, the ultimate fantasy role play game that you can play fully as an extension on Twitch! Join the adventure and immerse yourself in a world of magic and wonder where you can become the strongest player, team up with other players, and create the most powerful guild.

Embark on thrilling adventures alongside your favorite streamers and experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat!

name: Doctor Who: Dalek Hack
description:
A game included as part of the "Doctor Who and the micro:bit". An educational series of videos meant to teach basic coding.

A link has been created to the Dalek Spaceship computer network and the Doctor has prepared a fake Dalek with a micro:bit installed inside. By coding in JavaScript, Python or using Blocks, you must navigate the Dalek through each level until you save the universe from the Reality Bomb.

name: Dalek: Dissolution Earth
description:
A shooting gallery game where the Daleks have invaded Earth and you must defeat them to make your way to the river to escape to the north of the city.

Illustrated by Matt Parish, programmed by Phil Cox with original music by Ian Renshaw.

name: Whack-A-Dalek
description:
Classic game of whack-a-mole but with something you love to hate to give a good whack to.

Published by ScifiSlacker.com.

name: Life is Pain
description: Life is Pain is a 2D platformer with elements of hardcore, dynamic gameplay and abstract graphics in which you need to pass a variety of levels, playing as an alien.

name: Piratopia: Raiders of Pirate Bay
description: Set sail in the open seas and plunder solo, PvE or PvP. Trade goods for ship upgrades or equipments to hunt the Kraken, all in the same Server. Dominate by yourself or with maties.

name: Hold Position:Zombie
description: A six-checkerboard tower defense game. According to the characteristics of the soldiers and the changing terrain, and with limited resources, you can arrange the formation with the arms to create a steel defense line, resist the zombies coming in like a flood, and guard your headquarters

name: Feudal Friends
description: Feudal Friends is a competitive tower defense game. Each player has different tasks within the tower and they work together to produce new soldiers and determine strategies to conquer the opposing tower. Plan your strategy well because this war does not wait for anyone!

name: Boba
description:
Harvest Resources. Impose Your Will. Discover The Unknown.

Daniel Mullins' (Inscryption, Pony Island) winning entry into Ludum Dare 52.
An incremental game made in just 48 hours!
Free to download from here: https://dmullinsgames.itch.io/boba

name: A.L.T.
description: A 32-map megawad for Doom II from the Russian Doom clan Clan B0S know for its surreal narrative built around traditional Doom gameplay.

name: Lycanthorn III
description:
Join Rain in a short, sweet, action packed adventure through haunted forests, decrepit villages, and cold cobbled ruins...

Collect cash to buy powerful sidearms and upgrades, gather the five orbs to unlock Dracula's Castle, retake Morvania from the Vampires!

name: GRID Legends: Valentin’s Classic Car-Nage
description: Buckle up and prepare for adrenaline-fueled chaos as Demo Derby-style game mode Classic Car-Nage smashes its way into GRID Legends to rewrite every racing rule. Join Valentin Manzi, played by Ncuti Gatwa, to cause havoc and bash bumpers with your nemesis in GRID Legends’ epic, new game mode. With the pack’s 8 new Story Experiences, 5 eclectic new Vehicles, 4 new Tracks and 3 fresh Career Events, you’ll have all you need to claim bragging rights and cause optimum carnage.

name: Super Cosmic Land
description:
In this adventure, you are "Fierce" the self-proclaimed "Bandit King" who has just pulled of a heist and is basking in his stolen treasure on a remote planet from far, far away.

As he is reveling in his spoils, he is suddenly struck from the skies by a mysterious blot of darkness who also makes off with his treasure!

Help Fierce retrieve the treasure that he rightfully stole and find out who is behind this sudden theft of a thief!
